src: 「我們有 4 個月大曾經罹患糖尿病老鼠現在沒有糖尿病了」他補充道。
mt: "We're four months old and we've had diabetes in mice and now we don't have diabetes," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: 位於新斯科舍省哈利法克斯的戴爾豪斯大學醫學教授、加拿大糖尿病協會臨床及科學部門主席埃胡德·烏爾 (Ehud Ur) 醫師警告說，此研究仍在初期階段。
mt: Dr Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at the University of Dalehouse in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the Clinical and Scientific Department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, warned that this study is still in its initial stage.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: 如同其他專家，他對糖尿病是否可以治癒存疑，並指出這些發現與已經患有第一型糖尿病的人無關。
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured and points out that these findings have nothing to do with those who have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: 瑞典學院諾貝爾文學委員會常任秘書莎拉．戴紐斯，週一在瑞典的瑞典廣播電台節目中公開表示，委員會因為無法直接與巴布．狄倫聯繫領取 2016 年諾貝爾文學獎事宜，已放棄嘗試。
mt: Sarah Deneus, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, announced on Monday that the committee had given up trying to win the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature because it could not directly contact Bob Dylan.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: 戴紐斯說：「現在我們什麼都不做。我打過電話、也寄了電子郵件給他最親近的合作夥伴，也收到很友善的回覆。就現在來說，那樣的確就夠了。」
mt: “Now we’re doing nothing. I’ve called, I’ve emailed his closest partner and I’ve received a very friendly response. That’s enough for now,” he said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: 在此之前，鈴響公司的執行長傑米·西米諾夫曾說過他之所以創立該公司，是因為他在自家車庫改裝的店面聽不到前門的按鈴聲。
mt: Before that, the CEO of Bellbell Company, Jamie Siminov, had said that he founded the company because he couldn't hear the ringing bell from the front door in his garage shop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: 他說他做了一個無線網路門鈴。
mt: He said he made a wireless network doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: 西米諾夫表示當他 2013 年在《創業鯊魚幫》節目上露面後，銷售額提高了，當時節目評審拒絕投資這個新創公司。
mt: Siminov said that when he appeared on the "Start a Shark Gang" program in 2013, sales increased, and at the time, the judges refused to invest in this startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 在 2017 年末，西米諾夫出現在 QVC 購物頻道 上。
mt: In late 2017, Siminov appeared on the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring 也與保安產業的競爭對手 ADT 公司達成訴訟和解。
mt: Ring also reached a settlement with ADT, a security industry competitor.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: 儘管有一種實驗性的疫苗顯示能降低伊波拉病毒的致死率，但到目前為止，沒有藥物明確證實適合治療已受感染的人。
mt: Although there is an experimental vaccine that shows a reduction in the mortality rate of Ebola virus, no drug has been clearly proven to be suitable for treating people who have been infected so far.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 其中一種抗體雞尾酒 ZMapp，起初很可望在實務上帶來好消息，但正式研究指出，它的效果並未達到預防死亡的預期目標。
mt: One of the antibody cocktails, ZMapp, was initially expected to bring good news in practice, but official research showed that its effect did not meet the expected goal of preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ZMapp 在 PALM 試驗中作為對照組，代表科學家將其視為基準，與其他三種治療方法相比較。
mt: ZMapp, as a control group in the PALM trial, represents that scientists regard it as a standard, compared to the other three treatment methods.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 美國體操協會為美國奧委會的來信背書，並認同奧林匹克大家庭絕對有需要為我們所有的運動員推動安全的環境。
mt: The American Gymnastics Association endorsed a letter from the American Olympic Committee, acknowledging that the Olympic family absolutely needs to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: 我們同意美國奧委會的聲明，也就是我們的選手、團隊和其運動項目的利益，會因為我們組織內具有意義的改革而改善，而非取消資格。
mt: We agree with the statement of the US Olympic Committee that the interests of our athletes, teams and their sports will be improved by meaningful reforms within our organization rather than disqualifying them.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: 美國體操協會支持一項獨立調查，這項調查可能有助於釐清，在賴瑞·納薩爾事件中倖存下來的人提起勇氣描述的虐待內容，長期以來無人發現的原因，且會引入任何必需且妥當的調整。
mt: The American Gymnastics Association supports an independent investigation, which may help clarify the abuse content described by those who survived the Larry Nassar incident, which has been undetected for a long time and will introduce any necessary and proper adjustments.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: 美國體操協會和美國奧委會擁有相同的目標，也就是讓體操和其他運動儘可能安全，讓運動員得以在安全、正向和擁有自主權的環境中，追尋自己的夢想。
mt: The American Gymnastics Association and the US Olympic Committee share the same goal, that is to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and self-sovereign environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 整個 1960 年代，布里辛斯基擔任過約翰．甘迺迪的顧問及林登．詹森的幕僚。
mt: Throughout the 1960s, Brisinski served as a consultant to John F. Kennedy and a staff member of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 年的選舉中，他對卡特的外交政策提出建議，其後在 1977 至 1981 年間，接替亨利·季辛吉擔任國家安全顧問 (NSA)。
mt: In the 1976 election, he made recommendations on Carter's foreign policy, and then succeeded Henry Kissinger as National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: 作為美國國家安全局的一員，他在外交上協助卡特處理世界事務，例如 1978 年的大衛營協議；1970 年代後期為美中關係正常化出謀劃策；1979 年引發伊朗人質危機的伊朗革命；和 1979 年蘇聯入侵阿富汗。
mt: As a member of the US National Security Agency, he assisted Carter in handling world affairs in foreign affairs, such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; in the late 1970s, he devised plans for normalization of US-China relations; the Iranian Revolution that triggered the Iran hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 這部電影由雷恩·葛斯林和艾瑪·史東主演，並獲得所有主要獎項的提名。
mt: This film stars Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, and is nominated for all major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: 雷恩‧葛斯林和艾瑪‧史東分別獲提名為最佳男主角和最佳女主角。
mt: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were respectively nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳導演、最佳攝影、最佳服裝設計、最佳剪輯、最佳原創音樂、最佳製作設計、最佳音效剪輯、最佳混音及最佳原著劇本獎。
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Editing, Best Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 電影中的兩首歌曲〈Audition (The Fools Who Dream)〉和〈 City of Stars〉提名最佳原創歌曲。獅門影視總共提名 26 個獎項，傲視其他電影工作室。
mt: Two songs in the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate has been nominated for a total of 26 awards and is proud to be nominated by other film studios.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 星期日傍晚，美國總統唐納‧川普透過新聞秘書發表聲明，宣布美國軍隊將撤離敘利亞。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump issued a statement through his press secretary announcing that the U.S. military would withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: 川普與土耳其總統艾爾多安通過電話後便發表這則聲明。
mt: After Trump and Turkish President Erdogan made this statement over the phone, he issued it.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: 該聲明表示，土耳其也將負責看守遭囚禁的伊斯蘭國 (ISIS) 成員，歐洲眾國拒將那些成員遣送回國。
mt: The statement stated that Turkey will also be responsible for guarding the ISIS members who have been imprisoned, and European countries refuse to send those members back to their countries.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 這不僅證明了一個廣泛流傳的理論，認為至少某些恐龍有羽毛，也提供了大部分化石無法提供的細節，例如顏色和立體組成方式。
mt: This not only proved a widely circulated theory, believing that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provided most of the details that fossils could not provide, such as color and three-dimensional composition.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: 科學家說這種動物的羽毛外層是栗棕色，內層是泛白的顏色或胡蘿蔔色。
mt: Scientists say that the outer layer of this animal's feathers is reddish-brown, and the inner layer is pale white or carrot-colored.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: 該發現也為鳥類羽毛的進化提供深入的見解。
mt: This discovery also provides in-depth insights into the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: 因為恐龍的羽毛缺乏發展健全的軸，所謂羽軸，但確實存在其他羽毛特性，即羽枝與羽小枝，因此研究者推論，這些其他特性後來很可能就進化成了羽軸。
mt: Due to the lack of well-developed axes in dinosaur feathers, so-called feather axles did indeed exist other feather characteristics, namely feather branches and small branches, therefore researchers inferred that these other characteristics may have evolved into feather axles later on.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: 這些羽毛的結構顯示它們不是用來飛行而是用來調節溫度或展示的。研究人員表示，即使這是年輕恐龍的尾巴，該樣本也顯示其為成熟羽毛而非幼雛絨毛。
mt: The structure of these feathers shows that they are not used to fly but to regulate temperature or display. The researchers say that even if this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows that it is a mature feather rather than a juvenile fleece.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 研究人員認為，儘管這是一頭年輕恐龍的尾巴，但樣本中的羽毛已完全發育，而不是年幼動物的新生毛。
mt: Researchers believe that, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the feathers in the sample have fully developed, rather than the new hairs of young animals.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 昨天早上在土耳其加濟安泰普警察總部引爆的汽車炸彈，造成兩名員警死亡以及超過二十位民眾受傷。
mt: A car bomb exploded yesterday morning at the Gaziantep Police Headquarters in Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty civilians.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: 省長辦公室表示傷患中有十九名是警察。
mt: The provincial governor's office stated that 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 警方說，他們懷疑這起攻擊是由達伊沙（伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯蘭國）的好戰嫌疑犯所為。
mt: Police said they suspected that the attack was carried out by a good war suspect from Daisha (ISIS, Iraq and Levant).
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 他們發現太陽的運作與其他恆星的基本原理相同：系統中所有恆星的活動均受其光度、自轉所推動，就是這麼簡單。
mt: They found that the sun's operation is the same as other stars' basic principles: all star activity in the system is driven by its luminosity and rotation, which is so simple.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: 恆星的羅士比數跟電漿的流動有關，必須以光度和自轉來判斷。
mt: The star's rost ratio is related to the flow of plasma, which must be determined by luminosity and rotation.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: 羅士比數越小，星體在磁場逆轉方面就越不活躍。
mt: The smaller the Ross ratio, the less active a star is in terms of magnetic field reversal.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 在他的旅程中，岩崎圭一碰過不少麻煩。
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki Keiichi encountered a lot of trouble.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: 他被海盜搶劫、在西藏被一隻患有狂犬病的狗攻擊、在尼泊爾逃離了一場婚姻，並在印度被逮捕。
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a dog with rabies in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n 標準可在 2.4Ghz 和 5.0Ghz 頻率上運作。
mt: The 802.11n standard operates at 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: 如果基地台擁有雙射頻，這將使其向下兼容於 802.11a、802.11b 和 802.11g。
mt: If the base station has dual radio frequencies, this will make it backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n 的速度比過去的設備都要快非常多，理論上最高傳輸量可達每秒 600Mbit。
mt: 802.11n is much faster than previous devices, theoretically reaching a maximum transmission rate of 600 Mbits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 已婚且育有兩名成年子女的杜瓦爾，並沒有給與故事有關的米勒留下深刻的印象。
mt: Married with two adult children, Duval did not leave a deep impression on Miller related to the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: 當米勒被要求發表評論時，他表示：「麥克在聽證會上說了很多……我那時正在做準備，所以其實沒聽到他說了什麼。」
mt: When Miller was asked to comment, he said, "Mike said a lot at the hearing... I was preparing for it, so I didn't actually hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: 胡錦濤表示：「我們將致力於 2020 年以前，大幅降低 2005 年的單位國內生產毛額每個單位的溫室氣體排放量水準。」
mt: Hu Chin-tao says, "We will aim to significantly reduce the level of greenhouse gas emissions per unit of GDP in 2005 by 2020."
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: 他沒有設定減少的數量，只聲稱將依據中國的經濟產出進行削減。
mt: He did not set a reduction in quantity, only claiming that he would reduce it according to China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: 胡錦濤鼓勵發展中的國家「避免先汙染、後清理的老路」。
mt: Hu Jintao encourages developing countries to "avoid first polluting, then clearing out the old road."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: 他補充道：「然而，不應該要求他們承擔超出其發展階段、責任和能力的義務。」
mt: He added, "However, we should not ask them to take on the responsibility beyond their developmental stage, responsibility and ability."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: 伊拉克研究小組在今天格林威治標準時間 12 點提出報告。
mt: The Iraqi research team presented a report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: 它警告說，沒人能保證此時在伊拉克採取的任何行動方針將阻止宗派戰爭、持續成長的暴力或陷入混亂。
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any action plans taken at this time in Iraq will prevent sectarian wars, growing violence or chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: 此報告開頭先請求美國針對中東政策進行公開辯論並形成共識。
mt: This report begins by requesting that the United States conduct an open debate on Middle East policy and form a consensus.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: 此報告大力抨擊了行政機構現行對伊拉克政策的幾乎所有面向，並強烈主張立即改變方向。
mt: This report strongly attacked almost all aspects of the current administration's policy towards Iraq, and strongly advocated for an immediate change in direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 在其中 78 個建議，第一個就是應在今年年底前採行新的外交措施，以保護伊拉克的邊境免受敵國侵擾，並重建與其鄰國的外交關係。
mt: Among the 78 recommendations, the first is to implement new diplomatic measures by the end of this year to protect Iraq's border from enemy invasions and rebuild diplomatic relations with its neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 現任參議員、阿根廷第一夫人克莉絲汀娜‧費南德茲‧德基希納，昨晚在距離布宜諾斯艾利斯 50 公里（31 英里）的拉普拉塔市，宣布參選總統。
mt: Last night, in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, the current senator and First Lady of Argentina, Christine Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: 德基西納夫人在阿根廷劇院宣佈有意競選總統，這裡也是她在 2005 年投入參議院選戰、欲成為布宜諾斯艾利斯省代表團一員時的起點。
mt: Mrs. DeKissina announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, which was also the starting point when she entered the Senate in 2005 and wanted to be a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: 卡崔娜颶風發生之後，有關救濟與重建支出的爭議引發討論；一些財政保守派人士幽默地將其稱為「布希的紐奧良交易」。
mt: Following the Katrina hurricane, controversy over relief and reconstruction costs sparked discussion; some fiscal conservatives humorously called it "Bush's New Orleans Deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: 自由派對推動重建的批評，主要在於重建合約犒賞了一般認為的華府圈內人。
mt: Criticism of the Free Party's promotion of reconstruction mainly lies in the fact that rebuilding contracts reward people within the Washington metropolitan area who are generally considered to be part of it.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: 超過四百萬人到羅馬參加葬禮。
mt: More than four million people attended a funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: 出席人數眾多，因此不是每個人都能進入聖伯多祿廣場參加葬禮。
mt: Due to the large number of attendees, not everyone can enter St. Peter's Square for a funeral.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: 羅馬各處架設了幾面巨型電視螢幕，讓人民觀看儀式。
mt: In Rome, several giant television screens were set up throughout the city to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: 許多義大利城市和世界上其他地方也有類似的陳設，尤其是波蘭，並有為數眾多的人潮前來觀禮。
mt: Many Italian cities and other parts of the world also have similar settings, especially Poland, with a large number of people coming to watch.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 歷史學家曾經批評，過去聯邦調查局的政策是將資源集中在容易解決的案件，尤其是汽車失竊案，目的是要提高該機構的成功率。
mt: Historians have criticized that the former Federal Bureau of Investigation's policy was to focus resources on easily resolved cases, especially car thefts, in order to improve the success rate of the institution.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: 美國國會從 2005 財政年度開始撥款給猥褻防治措施，並要求聯邦調查局指派十名探員處理成人色情案件。
mt: The U.S. Congress began funding obscene prevention measures in the 2005 fiscal year, and asked the Federal Bureau of Investigation to assign ten agents to handle adult pornography cases.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 羅賓·烏特帕創下球局最高分，僅以 41 球便完成 70 次跑位，打下 11 個四分與 2 個六分。
mt: Robin Utpa set the highest score in the game, completing 70 runs with just 41 goals, scoring 11 points and 2 points.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: 中間棒次擊球手薩辛・坦都卡和拉胡爾・德拉維德表現出色，攜手合作之下得分來到了100分。
mt: Middle hitters Sasin Tenduka and Rahul Delawed performed outstandingly, with a team of 100 points scored.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: 但是，在失去隊長的三柱門後，印度只獲得 36 分和失去 7 個三柱門，球局便結束了。
mt: However, after losing the captain's three-column gate, India only scored 36 points and lost seven three-column doors, thus ending the game.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: 美國總統喬治·W·布希在 11 月 16 日早晨抵達新加坡，開始為期一週的亞洲之旅。
mt: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on the morning of November 16 to begin a one-week trip to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: 由新加坡副總理黃根成迎接，並與新加坡總理李顯龍商談貿易和恐怖主義等議題。
mt: Reception by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister, Huang Geng-Cheng, and discussing trade and terrorism issues with Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: 期中選舉失利的一週後，布希告訴聽眾將於亞洲擴大貿易一事。
mt: A week after the midterm election defeat, Bush told his listeners that he would expand trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: 在周二與新民主黨領導人傑克‧林頓於總理辦公室進行 25 分鐘會晤後，總理史蒂芬‧哈珀同意將政府的《空氣潔淨法》送交由所有黨派組成的委員會審核，再進行二讀。
mt: After a 25-minute meeting with New Democratic Party leader Jack Linton at the Prime Minister's office on Tuesday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to submit the government's Air Sanitation Act to a committee of all parties for review and second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: 雷頓在與總理的會面中，請求修改保守黨的環境法案，要求「全面徹底改寫」保守黨所提的環境法案。
mt: In his meeting with the Prime Minister, Leighton requested a revision of the Conservative environmental bill, calling for "a complete and thorough revision" of the Conservative environmental bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: 默西醫院位於塔斯馬尼亞州德文波特，自從聯邦政府介入接管該醫院的資助事宜，州政府及部分聯邦議會成員即批評該舉係為 11 月聯邦選舉序幕的噱頭。
mt: Mersey Hospital is located in Devonport, Tasmania. Since the federal government intervened to take over funding for the hospital, the state government and some members of the federal parliament have criticized it as a gimmick that kicked off the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: 但總理約翰·霍華德表示，該法案只是為了保護醫院的設施不被塔斯馬尼亞政府降級，為此撥出額外的 4,500 萬澳幣。
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard stated that the bill was only to protect hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government and allocated an additional A$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: 依據最新公告，海平面讀數顯示有海嘯發生。帕果帕果及紐埃附近有明確的海嘯活動紀錄。
mt: According to the latest announcement, sea level readings show tsunamis. There are clear tsunami activity records near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: 東加並未回報任何重大損壞或傷亡，但據稱暫時的電力中斷妨礙了東加相關單位接收太平洋海嘯警報中心 (PTWC) 發出之海嘯警報。
mt: Tonga reported no major damage or casualties, but it was claimed that a temporary power outage prevented Tonga-related units from receiving the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center (PTWC) tsunami warning.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: 儘管警告解除了，位於夏威夷海岸線上或附近的十四所學校仍然全數在星期三全日停課。
mt: Despite the warning being lifted, all 14 schools on or near Hawaii's coastline will be closed for the whole day on Wednesday.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 美國總統喬治·Ｗ·布希對此宣告事項表示支持。
mt: US President George W. Bush expressed support for this declaration.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: 布希發言人戈登·喬翰羅將朝鮮的承諾稱為「達成朝鮮半島可核實無核化目標的一大步。」
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Chohanro called North Korea's commitment a "big step" to meet the denuclearization targets of the Korean Peninsula.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: 大西洋颶風季的第十個已命名颶風──亞熱帶暴風傑瑞──今日在大西洋上成形。
mt: The tenth named hurricane of the Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Jerry, took shape today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: 國家颶風中心 (NHC) 表示現在傑瑞颶風不會對陸地造成威脅。
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said Hurricane Jerry will not pose a threat to land right now.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: 美軍工兵部隊預估 6 英吋的雨量便會沖毀先前受損的堤壩。
mt: US engineering troops estimated that six inches of rainfall would flood the previously damaged embankment.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: 卡崔娜颶風來襲時曾水淹高達二十英尺的第九區，目前水深及腰，附近的堤防沒入水中。
mt: When Hurricane Katrina struck, the ninth district was flooded with water as high as 20 feet, and its current depth is at its waist, with nearby dikes flooding the area.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 水溢出堤防的範圍寬達一百英尺。
mt: The water overflowing from the embankment's area is as wide as 100 feet.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: 維基共享資源 (Commons) 管理師亞當‧庫爾登上個月向維基新聞 (Wikinews) 透露他對刪減的不滿。
mt: Adam Kur, the manager of Commons, told Wikinews about his dissatisfaction with the deletion in the past month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: 「基本上他（威爾斯）從一開始就對我們撒謊。首先假裝這是出自法律考量；其次，假裝在聽我們說話，直到他的作品被刪除。」
mt: “Basically, he lied to us from the very beginning. First, he pretended it was for legal reasons; second, he pretended to listen to us until his work was deleted.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: 該網站為數百萬個獲得公開許可的媒體提供服務，而社群的不滿促使相關單位目前正在努力為該網站起草一項關於性內容的政策。
mt: The website serves hundreds of millions of publicly licensed media, and the community's dissatisfaction has prompted relevant units to work hard to draft a policy on sexual content for the website.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: 目前所做的研究主要都是理論上的，但此計畫的目的在於模擬對人馬座星系所做的觀察。
mt: Currently, the research done is mainly theoretical, but the purpose of this plan is to simulate observations of the Sagittarius Galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 該團隊想觀察到的效應，是由此星系與銀河各自之暗物質交互影響潮汐的結果
mt: The effect that the team wanted to observe was the result of tidal interaction between dark matter in each galaxy and galaxy.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: 正如同月亮對地球的引力造成潮汐一樣，銀河系也對射手座星系施加了作用力。
mt: Just as the Moon causes tidal forces to Earth's gravity, the Milky Way also exerts a force on the Sagittarius Galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 科學家能斷定暗物質用與一般物質相同的方式影響其他暗物質。
mt: Scientists can determine that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: 該理論聲稱一個銀河系周圍的暗物質大多會形成一種暈圈，且是由許多微粒所組成。
mt: This theory claims that most dark matter surrounding a galaxy will form a halo, composed of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: 電視報導顯示有白煙從核電廠中冒出。
mt: TV reports show white smoke emerging from the nuclear power plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: 地方政府警告該工廠附近的居民待在室內、關閉冷氣空調，且勿飲用自來水。
mt: The local government warned residents near the factory to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning, and do not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: 日本政府核能機構表示已在核電廠找到放射性銫及碘。
mt: The Japanese government's nuclear power agency has stated that radioactive caesium and ⁇  have been found at the nuclear power plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: 有關當局推測，現場裝有鈾燃料的容器可能已經破裂並正在洩漏。
mt: Regarding authorities' speculation, the containers containing uranium fuel on site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: 東尼·摩爾醫師 (Tony Moll) 在南非誇祖魯-納塔爾省發現了極具抗藥性的結核病（XDR-TB）。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered XDR-TB, a highly resistant tuberculosis, in KwaZulu-Natal province, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: 他在一次訪問中表示，新的變異株「有極高的致死率，因此非常令人不安和恐慌」。
mt: He said in an interview that the new variant "has a very high mortality rate, so it's very disturbing and panicked".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: 莫爾醫生認為有些病人可能是在醫院中感染上病菌，且至少有兩個病例為醫護人員。
mt: Dr. Mor believes that some patients may be infected with bacteria in the hospital, and at least two cases are medical personnel.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.

src: 一名受感染者在一年內可能會感染 10 到 15 名親密接觸者。
mt: An infected person may be infected with 10 to 15 intimate contacts within a year.
ref: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.

src: 然而，在整體結核病患者群當中，罹患廣泛抗藥性結核菌者，比率似乎仍非常低；在南非，任何特定時刻中，每 33 萬人有 6 千人受到感染。
mt: However, among the overall TB population, the proportion of patients with broad-spectrum resistant TB seems to be still very low; in South Africa, at any given time, every 330,000 people, 6,000 are infected.
ref: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.

src: 兩顆人造衛星重量都超過一千磅，並以每小時 17,500 英里左右的速度移動。它們在地球上方 491 英里處相撞。
mt: Both satellites weigh over 1,000 pounds and move at speeds of around 17,500 miles per hour. They collide about 491 miles east of the Earth.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.

src: 科學家說相撞造成的爆炸力道非常可觀。
mt: Scientists say that the explosive force caused by the collision is very impressive.
ref: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.

src: 他們仍在試著判斷撞擊的規模以及對地球的影響。
mt: They are still trying to determine the scale of the impact and its impact on Earth.
ref: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.

src: 美國國防部戰略司令部正在追蹤殘骸。
mt: The US Department of Defense's Strategic Command is tracking the wreckage.
ref: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.

src: 分析圖將公佈在一個公開網站上。
mt: The analysis chart will be published on a public website.
ref: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: 俄亥俄州有關當局週三表示，一名在賓州匹玆堡兒童醫院工作的醫師，在被發現她母親死於她後車箱中後，將被控加重謀殺罪。
mt: Ohio authorities said on Wednesday that a doctor working at the Pittsburgh Children's Hospital in Pennsylvania would be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in her trunk.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.

src: 29 歲的馬拉·巴拉蘇布拉曼尼安 (Malar Balasubramanian) 醫生在俄亥俄州的布魯艾施（辛辛那提以北約 15 英里的郊區）被發現，她穿著 T 恤和內衣躺在路邊的地上，顯然攝入了大量的藥物。
mt: A 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian was found in the outskirts of Ohio's Brook Esch (near Cincinnati, about 15 miles away), wearing a T-shirt and underwear, lying on the side of the road, apparently ingesting a lot of drugs.
ref: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.

src: 她指引警官前往 500 英尺外的黑色奧茲摩比 Intrigue 轎車。
mt: She directed the police to a black Ozmobee Intrigue sedan 500 feet away.
ref: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.

src: 他們在那裏發現了薩羅雅·巴拉蘇布拉馬尼安的遺體，53 歲的她身上蓋著沾了血跡的毯子。
mt: They found the body of Saroja Balasu Bramanian there, a 53-year-old woman with blood-stained blankets on her body.
ref: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.

src: 警方說，屍體看起來已擺在那裡 1 天左右。
mt: The police said the body looked like it had been there for about a day or so.
ref: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: 本季該疾病的首個案例是在七月底上報的。
mt: The first case of this season was reported at the end of July.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.

src: 這種疾病存在於豬身上，然後透過蚊子傳播給人類。
mt: This disease exists in pigs and is then transmitted to humans through mosquitoes.
ref: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.

src: 疫情促使印度政府採取一些措施，比方在重災區部署捕豬隊、分發大量蚊帳以及噴灑殺蟲劑。
mt: The epidemic prompted the Indian government to take some measures, such as deploying pig-hunting teams in disaster-stricken areas, distributing large numbers of mosquito nets and spraying insecticides.
ref: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.

src: 政府也承諾生產數百萬支腦炎疫苗，此舉將幫助衛生單位做好準備因應明年的疫情。
mt: The government also promises to produce hundreds of millions of encephalitis vaccines, which will help health units prepare for the next year's epidemic.
ref: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.

src: 由於缺乏資金且相對其他疾病的優先順序較低，今年運送疫苗到史上受感染最嚴重地區的計劃因而延遲。
mt: Due to lack of funds and lower priority compared to other diseases, the plan to transport vaccines to areas with the most severe infection in history was delayed this year.
ref: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: 斯拉尼亞於 1956 年搬到了瑞典。三年後，他開始為瑞典郵政局工作，並成為了他們的首席雕刻師。
mt: Slavia moved to Sweden in 1956. Three years later, he started working for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief sculptor.
ref: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.

src: 他為瑞典和其他 28 個國家製作了一千多枚郵票。
mt: He made over a thousand stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
ref: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.

src: 他的作品擁有如此高辨識度的品質和細節，這使他成為集郵家之間極少數「家喻戶曉」的人物之一。有些集郵家甚至只蒐集他的作品。
mt: His work has such high quality and detail that it makes him one of the few philatelists who are well known. Some even collect only his work.
ref: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.

src: 他所雕刻的第 1,000 款郵票是大衛·科洛克·埃倫斯特拉爾 (David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl) 2000 年的畫作──壯麗的《 瑞典國王偉大事蹟》，該作品被收錄於金氏世界紀錄中。
mt: The 1,000th stamp he carved was a painting by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl from 2000, the magnificent "Great deeds of the Swedish King", which is included in the Guinness World Records.
ref: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.

src: 他也參與許多國家的紙鈔雕刻工作，近期作品包括加拿大 5 元及 100 元新鈔上的總理肖像。
mt: He also participated in the paper currency carving work of many countries, and his recent works include the prime minister's portrait on Canadian $ 5 and $ 100 bills.
ref: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.

src: 意外發生後，吉布森被送往醫院，但不久後便身亡。
mt: After the accident, Gibson was sent to the hospital, but soon died.
ref: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.

src: 64 歲的卡車司機沒有在車禍中受傷。
mt: The 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the crash.
ref: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.

src: 車輛本身已在當天格林威治標準時間約 12:00 時自事故現場移除。
mt: The vehicle itself was removed from the scene of the accident around 12:00 GMT on the same day.
ref: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.

src: 在意外發生地點旁的車庫工作的人說：「當時那裡有一些孩子在等著過馬路，他們全都在尖叫和哭泣。」
mt: A garage worker near the site of the accident said, "There were some children waiting to cross the street, and they were all screaming and crying."
ref: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."

src: 他們全都從事故發生的地點跑回來。
mt: They all ran back from where the accident happened.
ref: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.

src: 峇里島議程中其他主題包括拯救世界上剩餘的森林，以及分享技術，幫助開發中國家以較不汙染環境的方式發展。
mt: Other topics on the Bali agenda include saving the remaining forests on the planet, and sharing technology to help developing countries develop in a less polluting way.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.

src: 聯合國也希望敲定一筆經費，幫助受全球暖化影響的國家解決衍生問題。
mt: The United Nations also hopes to set up a budget to help countries affected by global warming solve their derivative problems.
ref: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.

src: 這筆錢可用於防洪房屋、更佳的水資源管理和農作物多樣化。
mt: This money can be used for flood control houses, better water resources management and crop diversification.
ref: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: 弗路克寫到：企圖掩蓋女性疾呼婦女健康的作為都不會成功。
mt: Fluck wrote that attempts to cover up women's health will not succeed.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.

src: 她之所以得到這個結論，是因為收到了許多來自女性和男性的正向留言與鼓勵，極力主張將避孕藥物視為醫療必需品。
mt: She came to this conclusion because she received many positive comments and encouragement from women and men, strongly advocating that contraceptive drugs be considered medical necessities.
ref: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: 傷員送往醫院後，打鬥停止，這時剩下的囚犯中約有 40 人留在庭院中，拒絕回去自己的牢房。
mt: After the injured were sent to the hospital, the fighting stopped, and at this time, about 40 of the remaining prisoners remained in the courtyard, refusing to return to their cells.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.

src: 談判者嘗試矯正當時的狀況，但囚犯們的需求並不明確。
mt: Negotiators tried to correct the situation at that time, but prisoners' needs were unclear.
ref: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.

src: 北美山區時間下午 10:00 至 11:00 間，囚犯在庭院中縱火。
mt: Inmates set fire to the courtyard between 10:00 pm and 11:00 pm North American mountain time.
ref: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.

src: 全副武裝的鎮暴警察很快就進入院子，並利用催淚瓦斯把犯人逼到死角。
mt: The fully armed riot police quickly entered the courtyard and used tear gas to drive the perpetrators to a corner of death.
ref: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.

src: 消防隊最後在晚間 11:35 撲滅火勢。
mt: The fire department finally put out the fire at 11:35 pm.
ref: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: 1963 年大壩建成後，便抑止了將沉積物帶往整片河川的季節性洪水。
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, it stopped the seasonal flood that carried sediment to the entire river.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.

src: 這些沉積物是形成野生動物棲地的河口沙洲和海灘的必要物質。
mt: These sediments are necessary materials for the formation of wildlife habitats on estuaries and beaches.
ref: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.

src: 結果，兩種魚類已經滅絕，而包括隆背骨尾魚在內的其他兩種則瀕臨滅絕。
mt: As a result, two species of fish have become extinct, while the other two, including the long-tailed tailfish, are on the verge of extinction.
ref: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.

src: 雖然在洪水過後，水位只會上升幾英尺，政府仍希望這足以恢復下游被侵蝕的沙洲。
mt: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, the government still hopes that this can recover the eroded sandbars downstream.
ref: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: 未發出任何海嘯警報；且根據雅加達地球物理局的說法，因震規未達 6.5 級門檻，所以不會發布海嘯警報。
mt: No tsunami warning was issued; and according to the Jakarta Geophysics Bureau, since the earthquake gauge did not reach the 6.5-level threshold, it will not issue a tsunami warning.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.

src: 儘管那裡沒有海嘯的威脅，居民仍開始恐慌，並開始離開他們的公司和家。
mt: Despite the lack of tsunami threats, residents began to panic and started leaving their companies and homes.
ref: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: 雖然歐普拉含淚告別，但她向粉絲清楚表明她會回來的。
mt: Although Oprah tearfully bids farewell, she clearly expresses to her fans that she will come back.
ref: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.

src: 「這並非結束，而只是一章的結尾和新一章的開始。」
mt: "It's not the end, it's just the end of a chapter and the beginning of a new chapter."
ref: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."

src: 納米比亞總統兼議會選舉的最終結果顯示，現任總統希菲凱普涅·波漢巴高票連任，遙遙領先對手。
mt: The final results of the Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections show that incumbent President Hifiképne Pohamba won re-election with a landslide majority, far ahead of his opponent.
ref: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.

src: 執政黨西南非洲人民組織 (SWAPO) 也在國會選舉中保住了多數黨的地位。
mt: The ruling party, the South West African People's Organization (SWAPO), also retained its majority status in parliamentary elections.
ref: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.

src: 聯軍及阿富汗軍隊已進駐該地區，以維護現場安全，其他聯軍飛機也已出動支援。
mt: The coalition and Afghan troops have occupied the area to maintain the safety of the scene, while other coalition aircraft are also dispatched to support.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.

src: 這場墜機事件發生在高山區，據信是敵軍攻擊所致。
mt: This plane crash occurred in a high mountain area, believed to be caused by enemy attacks.
ref: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.

src: 搜尋墜機地點的工作遭遇了惡劣的天氣和嚴峻的地形。
mt: Searching for a crash site has encountered bad weather and harsh terrain.
ref: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: 醫療慈善機構曼戈拉、無國界醫生和世界衛生組織表示，這是該國有記錄以來，爆發過的最嚴重的疫情。
mt: Medical charitable organizations Mangola, Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization say this is the country's most severe outbreak on record.
ref: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.

src: 無國界醫生的發言人理查‧費爾曼表示：「安哥拉正面臨它們有史以來最嚴重的疫情，且安哥拉的情況仍然非常糟。」
mt: "Angola is facing its worst pandemic in history, and Angola is still in a very bad state," said Richard Fellman, a spokesman for MSF.
ref: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.

src: 比賽於上午十點整開始，天氣很好，早晨的細雨也很快就停了，堪稱七人制橄欖球的完美比賽日。
mt: The game started at 10am, the weather was very good, and the morning rain stopped quickly, which can be called a perfect game day for seven-a-side rugby.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.

src: 賽事頭號種子南非隊開賽非常順利，以 26 比 0 輕鬆取勝第五種子尚比亞隊。
mt: The top seeded South Africa team started very smoothly, winning the fifth-seeded Zambia team easily with a score of 26-0.
ref: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.

src: 雖然在比賽中與南方姊妹們相比確實生疏了些，但隨著比賽的進行，南非隊很穩定地在進步。
mt: Although they were indeed somewhat distant from the Southern sisters in the competition, as the game progressed, the South African team made a stable progress.
ref: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.

src: 他們靠著有紀律的防守、控球技巧與絕佳的團隊默契脫穎而出，顯然是不好對付的強隊。
mt: They stood out with disciplined defense, ball control skills and excellent team coordination, clearly a strong team that was not easy to deal with.
ref: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: 阿姆斯特丹政府和安妮之家的人員表示，這棵樹受到黴菌感染，極有可能傾倒，危害到公眾健康。
mt: Amsterdam government and Anne's staff said the tree was infected with mold, extremely likely to collapse, harming public health.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.

src: 原訂於周二砍伐，但因緊急法院裁決而獲救。
mt: Originally scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was rescued after an emergency court decision.
ref: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: 這些洞穴入口被稱為「七姊妹海蝕洞」，直徑至少達 100 至 250 公尺（328 至 820 英尺）。
mt: These cave entrances are called "Seven Sisters Sea-Erosion Caves", with diameters of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet).
ref: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.

src: 紅外線影像顯示其日夜溫差，顯現這些地方可能是洞穴。
mt: Infrared images show its day-night temperature difference, indicating that these places may be caves.
ref: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.

src: 「它們在白天比附近的平面更冷，夜晚則比附近的平面熱。
mt: "They're colder in the day than the planes around them, and hotter at night than the planes around them.
ref: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.

src: 「它們的熱行為不像地球上的大型洞穴那樣穩定、往往維持較一致的溫度，而是與深入地下的洞穴較為相近。」美國地理調查協會 (USGS) 天體地質學小組成員，亞利桑那州弗拉格斯塔夫北亞利桑那大學的葛倫‧庫欣表示。
mt: “Their thermal behavior is not as stable and consistent as large caves on Earth, but rather more similar to deep underground caves,” said Glenn Cushing, a member of the USGS team of astrogeology, University of Arizona in Flagstaff North Arizona.
ref: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.

src: 在法國，投票傳統上是個低技術的經驗：投票者獨自在投票亭內，將事先印妥表明投票對象的選票放入信封中。
mt: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters are alone in the voting booth, placing pre-printed ballots indicating the target of voting into envelopes.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.

src: 經官方人員確認選民的身份後，選民再將信封放入投票箱，並在投票單上簽名。
mt: After official personnel confirm the identity of the voter, the voter then places the envelope in the ballot box and signs the ballot paper.
ref: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.

src: 法國選舉法中十分嚴謹地編纂了投票程序。
mt: In French electoral law, the voting process was compiled very strictly.
ref: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.

src: 自 1988 年起，投票箱必須是透明的，以讓選民和觀察員可以見證投票開始時箱內沒有信封，並且除了經過授權且確實計數的選民投入的信封，沒有另外投入信封。
mt: Since 1988, the ballot box must have been transparent to allow voters and observers to witness that there were no envelopes inside the box at the start of voting, and except for authorized and actual count of voters' input envelopes, no separate envelopes were placed.
ref: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.

src: 候選人能派遣代表見證流程的每一部分。在晚間，志工在嚴格監督之下遵循特定程序計票。
mt: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, volunteers follow specific procedures to count votes under strict supervision.
ref: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: 先前在全球推出的華碩 Eee PC 兼顧了精省與功能性等要素，這款電腦已成為 2007 年台北資訊月的熱門話題。
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, which was launched globally earlier, combines elements of refinement and functionality, and has become a hot topic in 2007 Taipei Info Month.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.

src: 但在華碩獲得中華民國行政院所頒發的 2007 年台灣永續獎之後，筆記型電腦的消費者市場即發生劇烈變化和改變。
mt: However, after ASUS won the 2007 Taiwan Sustainability Award from the Executive Yuan, the notebook computer consumer market underwent a dramatic change.
ref: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: 該電臺的網站形容這個節目是「老套的廣播劇，但具有極其古怪的反轉，充滿新意！」
mt: The radio station's website described this program as "a quaint radio drama, but with extremely eccentric reversals, full of new ideas!"
ref: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"

src: 早期，這個節目只有在一個經營許久的網路電台 TogiNet 上播出，TogiNet 是一個聚焦於談話性廣播節目的電台。
mt: In the early days, this program was only broadcast on a long-running Internet radio station called TogiNet, which was a radio station focused on talk radio programs.
ref: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.

src: 在 2015 年末，TogiNet 成立了 AstroNet 電台，做為其子電台。
mt: At the end of 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet radio station as its sub station.
ref: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.

src: 該節目原本是由東德州當地的業餘配音員擔綱。
mt: The program was originally undertaken by a local amateur voice actor from East Texas.
ref: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.

src: 由於比什凱克的街道上並沒有出現執法員警，根據報告，大規模的搶劫活動一整晚都在持續發生。
mt: Due to the lack of law enforcement officers on Bishkek's streets, according to reports, large-scale looting activities continued throughout the night.
ref: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.

src: 一位觀察家將比斯凱克描述為陷入「無政府狀態」，因為成群的人們在街上遊蕩，搶劫零售商店。
mt: An observer described Bishkek as being in a state of "anarchy" because groups of people roamed the streets robbing retail stores.
ref: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.

src: 幾名比斯凱克居民譴責來自南方的抗議人士違法亂紀。
mt: Several Bishkek residents condemned protesters from the South for violating the law.
ref: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.

src: 南非隊在南非勒斯滕堡的皇家班巴夫肯球場舉辦的英式橄欖球三國聯賽中打敗了全黑隊（紐西蘭）。
mt: The South African team defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in the English Rugby Three Nations League held at the Royal Bafken Stadium in Lusterburg, South Africa.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.

src: 最後以 21 比 20 的比分一分獲勝，終止了紐西蘭國家橄欖球隊的 15 場連勝。
mt: The team ultimately won with a score of 21-20, ending New Zealand's national rugby union team's 15-game winning streak.
ref: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.

src: 對 Springboks 隊來說，這也終結了五連敗。
mt: For the Springboks team, this also ended a five-game losing streak.
ref: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.

src: 這是黑衫軍的最後一場比賽，該隊在兩週前已贏得獎盃。
mt: This was the last game of the Black Shirts, and they had won the trophy two weeks ago.
ref: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.

src: 該系列賽的最後一場比賽將於下週，當南非國家橄欖球隊在澳洲比賽時，在約翰尼斯堡的艾利斯公園球場舉行。
mt: The final game of the series will be held next week, when the South African national rugby union team plays in Australia at Ellis Park Stadium in Johannesburg.
ref: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: 星期一晚上 10:08，西蒙大拿發生了有感中度地震。
mt: On Monday evening at 10:08 PM, a moderate earthquake struck Simon Da Na.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.

src: 美國地質調查局 (USGS) 和美國地震資訊中心並未收到任何立即的災害報告。
mt: The US Geological Survey (USGS) and the US Center for Earthquake Information have not received any immediate disaster reports.
ref: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.

src: 震央位於狄龍北北東方約 20 公里（15 英里），比尤特南方約 65 公里（40 英里）。
mt: The epicenter is located about 20 kilometers (15 miles) north of Dilong, and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Biyut.
ref: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: 對人體有致命危險的禽流感病毒株 H5N1，已證實感染了一隻於週一在法國東部里昂附近沼澤地中發現的死野鴨。
mt: The H5N1 strain of bird flu that poses a lethal threat to the human body has been confirmed to be infected with a dead duck found in a marshland near Lyon, eastern France on Monday.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.

src: 隨著奧地利、德國、斯洛維尼亞、保加利亞、希臘，和義大利之後，法國是歐盟中第七個遭受這種病毒危害的國家。
mt: Following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy, France was the seventh country in the European Union to suffer from this virus.
ref: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.

src: 克羅埃西亞和丹麥的 H5N1 疑似案例依然未被確認。
mt: The H5N1 case in Croatia and Denmark has yet to be confirmed.
ref: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 錢伯斯曾控告上帝「造成數百萬的地球居民大量死亡、毀滅和驚恐不安。」
mt: Chambers has accused God of “causing millions of earthlings to die, to destroy, and to panic.”
ref: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."

src: 身為不可知論者的錢伯斯聲稱他的控訴太「輕率」，「任何人都能控告任何人。」
mt: As an agnostic, Chambers claims his charges are "frivolous" and that "anyone can sue anyone."
ref: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."

src: 這部由卡米爾．聖桑 (Camille Saint-Saens) 所寫的法國歌劇，是描述一位「以對毒品和日本的熱愛主宰人生」的藝術家。
mt: This French opera by Camille Saint-Saens describes an artist who “does life with a love of drugs and Japan.”
ref: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."

src: 因此，表演者在舞台上抽大麻捲菸，而戲院本身也鼓勵觀眾一起抽。
mt: The performers smoke marijuana on stage, and the theater itself encourages the audience to smoke together.
ref: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.

src: 前眾議院​議長紐特‧金瑞契、德克薩斯州州長瑞克‧裴利及女眾議員米歇爾‧巴克曼分別名列第四、五、六名。
mt: Former U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Newt Kingridge, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Rep. Michelle Buckman ranked fourth, fifth, and sixth respectively.
ref: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.

src: 結果出爐後，金瑞契恭賀桑托榮，卻對羅姆尼說了重話，因為他在在愛荷華州播放了針對金瑞契的負面競選廣告。
mt: After the results were released, Kim Ritchie congratulated Santoro, but he spoke harshly to Romney because he had played a negative campaign ad against Kim Ritchie in Iowa.
ref: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.

src: 裴利表示，他將「返回德州評估今晚決策會議結果，判斷自己在這場選戰中是否還有機會繼續挺進」，但後來卻說他將繼續參選，並參加 1 月 21 日的南卡羅萊納州初選。
mt: Perry said he would "return to Texas to assess the outcome of tonight's decision-making meeting, and decide whether he still has a chance to advance in this election," but later said he would continue running and participate in the South Carolina primary election on January 21.
ref: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.

src: 巴赫曼在八月份的埃姆斯民意調查中獲勝，並決定終止競選。
mt: Bachman won the August Ames poll and decided to terminate his campaign.
ref: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.

src: 該名攝影師被送往加州大學洛杉磯分校雷根醫學中心，之後仍不幸死亡。
mt: The photographer was sent to the Reagan Medical Center at the University of California, Los Angeles, and unfortunately died afterwards.
ref: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.

src: 據報導，他當時的年紀是 20 多歲。 在一份聲明中，小賈斯汀說：「雖然我當時不在現場，這起悲劇事件與我也沒有直接的牽涉，但我非常關心受害者的家屬，並為他們祈禱。」
mt: According to reports, he was in his 20s. In a statement, Justin said, “Although I was not there at the time, I had no direct involvement in the tragedy, but I was very concerned and prayed for the families of the victims.”
ref: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

src: 娛樂新聞網站 TMZ 獲知，該名攝影師在塞普爾韋達大道 (Sepulveda Boulevard) 的對側停下車，試圖在穿過馬路並繼續前進之前對警察攔停點拍照，這促使加州公路巡警的警官兩次執行交通攔停，命令他回到車道對面。
mt: TMZ, an entertainment news website, learns that the photographer stops on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard, trying to take photos of police stops before crossing the road and continuing forward, prompting California Highway Patrol officers to twice carry out traffic stops, ordering him to return to the other side of the road.
ref: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.

src: 警方表示，撞到該攝影師的駕駛人可能不會面臨刑事指控。
mt: Police said that the driver who hit the photographer may not face criminal charges.
ref: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.

src: 由於一天只頒發 18 面獎牌，許多國家都無法站上領獎台。
mt: Because only 18 medals are awarded each day, many countries are unable to stand on the ⁇ .
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.

src: 其中包含在昨天的女子站姿滑雪超大曲道比賽中獲得第九名之荷蘭選手安娜‧約赫姆森，以及同一賽事裡第十名的芬蘭選手卡蒂亞·薩利寧。
mt: Among them are the Dutch player Anna Jokhmsen, who finished ninth in yesterday's women's figure skiing extra-large track event, and Katia Salin, who finished tenth in the same event.
ref: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.

src: 澳洲的米切爾‧古爾利 (Mitchell Gourley) 在男子站姿超級大迴轉排名第十一。來自捷克的競爭對手奧德里奇·耶利內克 (Oldrich Jelinek) 則在男子坐姿超級大迴轉項目排名第十六名。
mt: Australian Mitchell Gourley ranked 11th in the men's standing super-turning event. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek was 16th in the men's sitting super-turning event.
ref: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: 墨西哥的阿利·貝拉斯克斯在男子坐式超大曲道競賽排名第 15 位。紐西蘭的亞當·霍爾在男子站式超大曲道競賽排名第 9 位。
mt: Ali Belashx of Mexico is ranked 15th in the Men's Sling Oversized Curves Competition. Adam Hall of New Zealand is ranked 9th in the Men's Stand Oversized Curves Competition.
ref: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.

src: 波蘭男子視障滑雪選手麥傑·克雷澤和領滑員安娜·奧加辛斯卡在超級大迴轉中獲得第 13 名。南韓朴宗石在男子坐式超級大迴轉中獲得第 24 名。
mt: Polish men's visually impaired skier Majer Kraze and lead skater Anna Ogasinska finished 13th in the Super Rotation. South Korea's Park Chung-sik finished 24th in the Men's Sliding Super Rotation.
ref: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: 2010 年發生地震後，抵達海地的聯合國維和部隊被認為是傳播該疾病的罪魁禍首，該疾病始於部隊的營地附近。
mt: Following the 2010 earthquake, UN peacekeepers arriving in Haiti were considered the culprits behind the spread of the disease, which began near the unit’s camp.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.

src: 根據該起訴訟，聯合國營地的廢棄物未經適當消毒，導致海地最大河流之一阿蒂博尼特河的支流滋生細菌。
mt: According to the lawsuit, the United Nations camp's waste has not been properly disinfected, resulting in bacteria breeding in a tributary of Haiti's largest river, the Atibonet River.
ref: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.

src: 在部隊進駐前，海地自十八世紀以來從未發生過與霍亂有關的問題。
mt: Prior to its deployment, Haiti had never had a problem related to cholera since the 18th century.
ref: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.

src: 海地正義與民主組織參考了幾份獨立研究，這些研究認為尼泊爾聯合國維和部隊在不知情的情況下將該疾病帶入海地。
mt: Haiti's Justice and Democracy organization referenced several independent studies, which believed that Nepal's UN peacekeeping forces unwittingly brought the disease into Haiti.
ref: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.

src: 聯合國的疾病專家丹妮耶‧蘭特內表示，爆發很可能是由維和部隊造成的。
mt: UN disease expert Danielle Landner said the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeeping forces.
ref: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: 漢彌爾頓 (Hamilton) 證實霍華德大學醫院 (Howard University Hospital) 收治了病情穩定的病人。
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital had taken care of patients with stable conditions.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.

src: 病人曾到過奈及利亞，當地有幾起伊波拉病毒案例。
mt: The patient has been to Nigeria, where there are several cases of Ebola virus.
ref: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.

src: 該醫院已遵行感染控制的規定，包括隔離患者以避免可能感染其他人。
mt: The hospital has complied with infection control regulations, including isolating patients to avoid possible infection of others.
ref: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: 在《辛普森家庭》之前，西蒙曾在幾場演出中擔任不同角色。
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon played different roles in several performances.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.

src: 1980 年代，他參與了多個電視節目的製作，包括 《計程車》、《歡樂酒吧》及《 特蕾西·厄爾曼秀》。
mt: In the 1980s, he was involved in the production of several television programs, including Taxi, Happy Bar and Tracy Elman Show.
ref: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.

src: 1989 年，他與布魯克斯和格寧一起合作，協助創作出《辛普森家庭》，並負責為該劇雇用第一個編劇團隊。
mt: In 1989, he collaborated with Brooks and Gning to help create The Simpsons, and was responsible for hiring the first writers for the series.
ref: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.

src: 儘管他在 1993 年退出節目，他仍保留了執行製作人的頭銜，並持續在每一季獲得數千萬元的版稅收入。
mt: Although he left the program in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to earn tens of millions of yuan in royalties per season.
ref: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: 稍早之前，中國新聞媒體新華社曾報導一架飛機被劫持。
mt: Earlier, Chinese news media Xinhua News Agency reported that a plane was hijacked.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.

src: 後續的報告說明該飛機接獲炸彈威脅，因而改道返回阿富汗，降落於坎大哈。
mt: Subsequent reports indicate that the plane received a bomb threat, so it was diverted back to Afghanistan and landed in Kandahar.
ref: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.

src: 初期報告指出該飛機在烏魯木齊要求緊急降落被拒後，改到返回阿富汗。
mt: The initial report indicated that the plane was refused an emergency landing request in Urumqi, and then returned to Afghanistan.
ref: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: 伊朗因民用和軍用的飛機都年久失修，而空難事件頻仍。
mt: Iran has experienced frequent air crashes due to its long-term disrepair of both civilian and military aircraft.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.

src: 國際制裁表示無法購入新飛機。
mt: International sanctions say it is unable to purchase a new aircraft.
ref: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.

src: 本週初，一架警用直升機墜毀，造成三個人死亡和另外三個人受傷。
mt: A police helicopter crashed early this week, killing three people and injuring three others.
ref: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.

src: 伊朗在上個月發生了數年來最慘的一起空難，一架飛往亞美尼亞的班機墜毀，機上有 168 人罹難。
mt: Iran experienced its worst air disaster in years last month, with a plane flying to Armenia crashing, killing 168 people on board.
ref: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.

src: 同一個月，在馬什哈德有另一架民航客機滑行衝出跑道、撞上一面牆、並造成十七人死亡。
mt: In the same month, another civilian airliner taxied out of the runway in Mashhad, crashed into a wall and caused 17 deaths.
ref: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: 史密斯飛船已經取消他們巡迴演唱會的剩餘場次。
mt: The remaining performances of their tour have been cancelled by Smith.
ref: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.

src: 該搖滾樂團將在美國和加拿大巡迴直到 9 月 16 日。
mt: The rock band will tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
ref: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.

src: 在主唱史蒂芬·泰勒於 8 月 5 日表演時跌落舞台受傷後，他們便取消了巡迴演出。
mt: After lead singer Stephen Taylor fell off the stage and was injured on August 5, they cancelled their tour.
ref: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.

src: 在雙方輪流發完該盤所有球數後，莫瑞於搶七局中輸掉了第一盤。
mt: After both teams took turns to serve all the balls in that game, Murray lost the first set in seven innings.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.

src: 德爾波特羅在第二盤前期佔上風，但在比分達到 6-6 時仍需要搶七決勝負 。
mt: Del Potro dominated in the early second set, but still needed to win seven games when the score reached 6-6.
ref: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.

src: 波特羅在此時接受了肩部治療，但仍設法回到比賽。
mt: Potro received shoulder treatment at this time, but still managed to return to the competition.
ref: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: 表演節目從當地時間晚間 8 點半開始（UTC 15:00 ）。
mt: The performance programme starts at 8:30 pm local time (UTC 15:00).
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).

src: 全國的知名歌手朝 Shri Shyam 的腳下獻上了拜讚歌，或稱奉獻歌。
mt: Nationally renowned singers sang hymns, also known as devotion songs, at the feet of Shri Shyam.
ref: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.

src: 歌手桑傑‧夏滿揭開了晚場的序幕，隨後登場的是傑‧香卡‧喬杜理。拉克‧辛格也獻唱了拜讚歌 chhappan bhog。陪同他表演的是歌手拉朱‧坎德瓦。
mt: Singer Sanjay Sharman kicks off the show, followed by Jacques Jacques Jorduri. Lak Singer also sang the hymn chhappypan bhog, accompanied by singer Raju Kanderwa.
ref: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: 然後由拉卡．辛領銜帶唱拜讚歌。
mt: Then, led by Raqqa Sin, sang a hymn of praise.
ref: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.

src: 108 盤夏潘柏格（在印度教中，供奉神靈的 56 種不同的食品，例如糖果、水果、堅果、菜餚等）被供奉給了巴巴夏母。
mt: 108 pans of Shepard Berg (in Hinduism, 56 different foods that enshrine the gods, such as candies, fruits, nuts, dishes, etc.) were offered to the Babasya mother.
ref: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.

src: 拉克辛也獻上 56 饗聖歌。歌手拉朱坎德爾沃爾則陪他獻唱。
mt: Laksin also sang a 56-song of the feast. The singer La Jucandelwall sang it with him.
ref: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: 在星期四的東京電玩展主題演講中，任天堂總裁岩田聰公布了公司新的任天堂 Revolution 遊戲機。
mt: In a keynote speech at the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday, Nintendo President Satoshi Iwata announced the company's new Nintendo Revolution game machine.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.

src: 控制器類似電視遙控器，利用兩個放置在使用者電視旁邊的感測器，以三角測量方式在立體空間中測量其位置。
mt: The controller is similar to the TV remote control, using two sensors placed next to the user's TV to measure its position in a three-dimensional space by triangulation.
ref: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.

src: 這將讓玩家透過在空中揮動裝置以控制電子遊戲中的動作和移動。
mt: This will allow players to control the movement and movement of electronic games by waving devices in the air.
ref: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: 尚卡羅‧費希切拉無法控制車輛，使得比賽開始後不久就結束了。
mt: The car was uncontrollable by the car, and the race ended shortly after its start.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.

src: 他的隊友費爾南多·阿隆索在大部分的賽程都領先，但一離開維修站，他的賽事也跟著告終，大概是因為右前輪沒裝好。
mt: His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but as soon as he left the pit lane, his game also ended, probably because the right front wheel was not installed.
ref: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.

src: 麥可・舒馬克在阿隆索出局後不久，也因為在比賽中多次與對手競速，造成懸吊系統損壞而結束了比賽。
mt: Michael Schumacher ended the game shortly after Alonso's elimination, as he repeatedly speeded with his opponents in the competition, causing damage to the suspension system.
ref: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: 根據記者會的文字記錄，他說：「她很可愛，也很會唱歌。」
mt: According to the press conference, he said: "She's very cute and she's also very good at singing."
ref: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.

src: 「每一次我們進行彩排時，我都打從心底受到感動。」
mt: "Every time we do rehearsals, I'm moved from the bottom of my heart."
ref: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."

src: 發射約 3 分鐘後，艙內攝影機顯示許多絕緣泡沫塑料碎片自油箱脫落。
mt: About three minutes after firing, the in-cabin camera showed many insulated foam plastic fragments falling off the oil tank.
ref: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.

src: 但一般認為這並未對太空梭造成任何損害。
mt: However, it is generally believed that this did not cause any damage to the space shuttle.
ref: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.

src: 美國國家航空暨太空總署的太空梭計畫領導人小N.韋恩·海爾說泡棉是在「我們擔心的時間過後」才掉落的。
mt: NASA's Space Shuttle program leader, N. Wayne Haier, said the foam fell "after the time we were worried about".
