ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.

src: 由於區間巴士經常客滿，建議您提前幾天購買車票。
mt: Due to the frequent passenger volume of the inter-city bus, it is recommended that you purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
ref: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.

src: 大部分的區域都可藉由舒適堅固的日本 Coaster 巴士到達。
mt: Most areas are accessible via the comfortable and robust Japan Coaster bus.
ref: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.

src: 共乘計程車是旅行至鄰近地方快速且舒適的方式，例如帕羅（150 努）和普那卡（200 努）。
mt: A shared taxi is a quick and comfortable way to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (150 Nu) and Punaka (200 Nu).
ref: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: 奧亞波克河大橋是一座斜張橋，橫跨奧亞波克河，連接巴西的奧亞波基與法屬圭亞那的聖喬治德奧亞波克。
mt: The Oapoque River Bridge is a diagonal bridge spanning the Oapoque River, connecting Oapoque in Brazil to Saint George de Oapoque in French Guiana.
ref: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.

src: 兩座塔高達 83 公尺，長度 378 公尺，兩條車道分別為 3.5 公尺寬。
mt: The two towers reach a height of 83 meters, with a length of 378 meters, and the two lanes are respectively 3.5 meters wide.
ref: The two towers rise to a height of 83 meters, it's 378 meters long and it has two lanes of 3.50 m wide.

src: 橋下的垂直間距為 15 公尺。工程於 2011 年 8 月完工，但直至 2017 年 3 月才通車。
mt: The vertical spacing under the bridge is 15 meters. The project was completed in August 2011, but it was not opened until March 2017.
ref: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.

src: 此座橋計劃於 2017 年 9 月－也就是巴西海關檢查站預計完工之時－全面通車。
mt: This bridge is planned to be fully operational from September 2017, when the Brazilian Customs Inspection Station is expected to be completed.
ref: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.

src: 瓜拉尼人是居住於現今巴拉圭東部最重要的原住民族，過著半游獵的生活，同時也從事自給農業。
mt: The Guarani people are the most important indigenous people living in eastern Paraguay today, living a half-day hunting life, and also engaged in self-sufficient agriculture.
ref: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.

src: 查科地區是瓜庫魯和帕亞瓜等其他原住民部落的家園，這些原住民以打獵、採集和捕魚維生。
mt: The Chaco region is the home of other indigenous tribes such as Guakuru and Pajagua, which make a living by hunting, gathering and fishing.
ref: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.

src: 16 世紀，巴拉圭（之前被稱為「印度的巨型省份」）是因著西班牙征服者和原住民的相遇而誕生的。
mt: In the 16th century, Paraguay (formerly known as the "giant province of India") was born from the encounter of Spanish conquerors and indigenous peoples.
ref: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.

src: 西班牙人開始了長達三個世紀的殖民時期。
mt: The Spanish began a three-century colonial period.
ref: The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries.

src: 自從 1537 年亞松森建城以來，巴拉圭就設法保持當地的諸多特色與風貌。
mt: Since its founding in Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to maintain its many characteristics and features.
ref: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.

src: 阿根廷以擁有世界頂尖馬球隊和球員而聞名。
mt: Argentina is known for having the world's top horse team and players.
ref: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.

src: 年度最大的賽事會於十二月在拉斯卡尼塔斯的馬球場舉行。
mt: The largest tournament of the year will be held in December at the Horse Stadium in Las Canitas.
ref: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas.

src: 在每年的其它時間也會舉辦其它較小的錦標賽或比賽。
mt: Other smaller tournaments or competitions are also held at other times of each year.
ref: Smaller tournaments and matches can also be seen here at other times of the year.

src: 賽事相關消息以及馬球比賽購票處，請洽阿根廷馬球協會。
mt: Please contact the Argentine Polo Association for more information about the event and the ticket office for the polo game.
ref: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.

src: 福克蘭群島的官方貨幣是福克蘭群島鎊 (FKP)，價值與英鎊 (GBP) 相等。
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland Islands Pound (FKP), with a value equal to that of the British Pound (GBP).
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).

src: 群島上唯一的銀行位於史坦利，在「福克蘭群島公司（FIC）西店」的對面，是唯一能夠兌換貨幣的地點。
mt: The only bank on the island is located in Stanley, opposite the "Forkland Islands Company (FIC) West Store", and it is the only place where currency can be exchanged.
ref: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.

src: 群島上各處一般可以接受英鎊，在史坦利境內也常可以接受信用卡和美元。
mt: In general, sterling is accepted everywhere on the islands, and credit cards and dollars are also commonly accepted within Stanley.
ref: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.

src: 外島地區也許可以使用英美貨幣，但應該無法使用信用卡；請事先詢問商家，以確定可使用哪種付款方式。
mt: You may be able to use English and American currencies in the Outlying Islands, but you should not be able to use your credit card. Please ask the merchant in advance to determine which payment method you can use.
ref: On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method.

src: 要在福克蘭群島以外兌換它的貨幣幾乎不可能，所以務必在離開前完成兌換。
mt: It is almost impossible to exchange its currency outside the Falkland Islands, so it must be completed before leaving.
ref: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: 由於蒙特維多位於赤道以南，因此當北半球冬季時，那裡是夏季，反之亦然。
mt: Because Montevideo is located south of the equator, it's summer in the northern hemisphere during winter and vice versa.
ref: Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa.

src: 蒙特維多位於亞熱帶地區，夏季時氣溫經常超過攝氏 30 度。
mt: Montevideo is located in a subtropical region, with summer temperatures often exceeding 30 degrees Celsius.
ref: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common.

src: 那裡的冬天寒意有時會騙人，因為氣溫很少低於零下，但風加上濕度，讓人感覺比溫度計上顯示的冷多了。
mt: The coldness of winter in that place sometimes deceives people, because the temperature is rarely lower than zero, but the wind and humidity make people feel much colder than what is shown on the thermometer.
ref: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.

src: 沒有特定的「雨季」及「旱季」，全年雨量大約是平均分配。
mt: There is no specific "rainy season" and "dry season", with annual rainfall roughly equal distribution.
ref: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.

src: 儘管公園中的許多動物都習慣見到人類，但野生動物畢竟是野生的，因此不應餵食或打擾它們。
mt: Although many animals in the park are accustomed to seeing humans, wild animals are after all wild and should not be fed or disturbed.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed.

src: 公園當局指出，至少應與熊、狼保持 100 碼/米的距離，並與其他野生動物保持 25 碼/米的距離。
mt: The park authorities point out that at least 100 yards/meter distance should be maintained with bears and wolves, and 25 yards/meter distance from other wild animals.
ref: According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals!

src: 無論他們看起來有多溫順，野牛、駝鹿、麋鹿、熊與幾乎所有大型動物都具攻擊性。
mt: No matter how docile they look, bison, moose, deer, bears and almost all large animals are aggressive.
ref: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.

src: 每年有數十名遊客因為未保持適當距離而受傷。這些動物體型龐大、未經馴養，且具有潛在的危險性，因此請給牠們足夠的空間。
mt: Dozens of tourists are injured every year because they don’t maintain a proper distance. These animals are large, untamed and potentially dangerous, so give them enough space.
ref: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.

src: 此外，要注意氣味會吸引熊和其他野生動物，因此請避免攜帶或烹煮氣味濃重的食物，並維持營地乾淨。
mt: In addition, please be aware that smells attract bears and other wild animals, so please avoid carrying or cooking foods with strong odors and keep the camp clean.
ref: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.

src: 阿皮亞是薩摩亞的首都。這個城鎮位於烏波盧島上，人口接近 40,000 人。
mt: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is located on the island of Upolu and has a population of nearly 40,000.
ref: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.

src: 阿皮亞在 1850 年代被發現，1959 年至今為薩摩亞的正式首都。
mt: Apia was discovered in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
ref: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.

src: 1889 年這個港口發生了惡名遠播的海軍僵持事件，當時七艘來自德國、美國、和英國的軍艦都拒絕離港。
mt: In 1889, a notorious naval stalemate took place at the port, when all seven warships from Germany, the United States and Britain refused to leave.
ref: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.

src: 除了一艘英國船艦外，其他所有船隻都沉沒了。將近 200 名美國人和德國人喪命。
mt: Except for one British ship, all the other ships sank. Almost 200 Americans and Germans died.
ref: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.

src: 在由馬烏運動所組織的爭取獨立的過程中，主要酋長圖普瓦·塔馬塞斯·萊拉菲三世 (Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III) 在鎮上的一次和平集會中遭到殺害。
mt: During the process of seeking independence organized by the Mau Movement, the main chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III was killed at a peaceful assembly in town.
ref: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.

src: 奧克蘭跨越 2 座海港，因此擁有許多海灘。最受歡迎的海灘位於 3 個區域。
mt: Auckland is bridging 2 seaports, so it has a lot of beaches. The most popular beaches are located in 3 areas.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.

src: 北岸海灘（北港區）位於太平洋沿岸，從北邊的長灣一路延伸到南邊的德文港。
mt: The North Shore Beach (North Coast Zone) is located on the Pacific coast, stretching from Long Bay to Devonport in the north.
ref: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.

src: 那些地方幾乎都是能讓人安全游泳的沙灘，且大多數都有紐西蘭聖誕樹提供的樹蔭。
mt: These places are almost all beaches that allow people to swim safely, and most of them have tree shades provided by New Zealand Christmas trees.
ref: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.

src: 塔瑪基大道海灘位於懷特瑪塔港，在奧克蘭中央的米慎海灣與聖赫利爾的高級郊區。
mt: Tamaki Avenue Beach is located in Whitemata Harbour, in the central part of Auckland's high-end suburbs of Myson Bay and St Helier.
ref: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.

src: 這些是有時擁擠的家庭海灘，岸邊有成排的商店林立。在這裡游泳很安全。
mt: These are sometimes crowded family beaches with lined shops along the shore. Swimming is safe here.
ref: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: 當地主要的啤酒是「第一」，它不是口味複雜的啤酒，而是順口和清爽的啤酒。另一款當地啤酒稱為「曼塔」。
mt: The main local beer is the first, it is not a complicated beer, but a smooth and refreshing beer. Another local beer is called the Manta.
ref: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".

src: 雖然也有許多法國酒，但紐西蘭及澳洲酒可能較經得起長途運送。
mt: Although there are also many French wines, New Zealand and Australian wines may be able to withstand long-distance transportation.
ref: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.

src: 當地自來水十分安全，可直接飲用，但如果不放心，也很容易能買到瓶裝水。
mt: Local tap water is very safe to drink, but if you don't worry, it's also easy to buy bottled water.
ref: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.

src: 對澳洲人來說，「白咖啡」是外來的點子。濃縮咖啡是「espresso」，卡布奇諾則是咖啡上擠滿高聳的鮮奶油（非奶泡），而茶則不含牛奶。
mt: For Australians, white coffee is an outside idea. Espresso is espresso, cappuccino is a coffee filled with tall cream (not milk brews), and tea does not contain milk.
ref: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

src: 熱巧克力的水準符合比利時標準。果汁很貴，但非常好喝。
mt: The standard of hot chocolate is Belgian. The juice is very expensive, but very delicious.
ref: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.

src: 一年四季都有許多人到大堡礁旅行，鮮少有人因此在大堡礁受傷。
mt: Many people travel to the Great Barrier Reef throughout the year, with few getting injured as a result.
ref: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.

src: 遊客仍須聽取當局建議、遵守所有標示，並密切注意安全警示。
mt: Tourists must still listen to the authorities' suggestions, follow all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
ref: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.

src: 從 10 月到 4 月，箱型水母在 1770 北邊的海灘和河口附近出現。在這些時間以外，偶爾也可以發現牠們的蹤跡。
mt: From October to April, box jellyfish appear near the beaches and estuaries north of the 1770s. From time to time, they can be found occasionally.
ref: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.

src: 鯊魚的確存在，然而牠們很少攻擊人類。多數鯊魚害怕人類且會游走。
mt: Sharks do exist, but they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are afraid of humans and swim.
ref: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.

src: 灣鱷在海洋中的活動並不活躍，牠們的主要棲息地是洛坎普頓北邊河口。
mt: The activity of the crocodilians in the ocean is not active, their main habitat being the mouth of the northern shore of the Locampton.
ref: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.

src: 提前預訂可以讓旅人安心，知道一抵達目的地就有睡覺的地方。
mt: Pre-booking in advance will give travelers peace of mind knowing that they will sleep wherever they arrive.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.

src: 旅行社通常會跟特定的飯店合作，不過你也可以透過旅行社預訂其他類型的住宿，比方露營地。
mt: Travel agencies usually work with specific hotels, but you can also book other types of accommodations through your travel agency, such as camping.
ref: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.

src: 旅行社提供的套裝行程通常會包括早餐和往返機場的交通，甚至提供結合航班和飯店的套組。
mt: Packages provided by travel agents typically include breakfast and transfers to and from the airport, and even a package that combines flights and hotels.
ref: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.

src: 如果您需要時間考慮提案或為您的目的地收集其他文件（如簽證）時，他們也可以為您保留預訂。
mt: If you need time to consider a proposal or collect other documents for your destination, such as a visa, they can also keep your booking for you.
ref: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).

src: 不過，若遇到任何需要改善的問題或有任何要求，應該要先聯絡旅行社，而非直接聯絡旅館。
mt: However, if you encounter any problems that need to be improved or have any requirements, you should first contact the travel agency rather than directly contacting the hotel.
ref: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: 在某些節慶中，參加音樂節的大部分遊客都會選擇在現場露營，而且他們大多認為這是體驗的重要環節。
mt: During some festivals, most visitors to the music festival choose to camp on-site, and they mostly consider this an important part of the experience.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.

src: 如果你想近距離觀賞活動，你必須提早進去，找到一個靠近音樂演奏的露營地點。
mt: If you want to get up close, you have to go in early and find a campsite close to the music.
ref: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.

src: 請記得，就算主舞台的音樂演出結束了，音樂祭其它地方的表演仍有可能持續到深夜。
mt: Please remember that even if the main stage's music performance is over, the performances in other areas of the festival may continue until late at night.
ref: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.

src: 針對有幼童的家庭，有些節慶會場會安排專屬的露營區域。
mt: For families with young children, some festival venues arrange exclusive camping areas.
ref: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: 若是在冬季穿越北波羅的海，請確認您艙房的位置，因為對受影響最嚴重的艙房，穿過浮冰會產生非常可怕的噪音。
mt: If you are travelling through the North Baltic Sea during winter, please confirm the location of your cabin as the most severely affected cabins will produce a very scary noise when you pass through the ice.
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.

src: 聖彼得堡郵輪行程包括城內觀光。船上乘客無須持有簽證 (檢查相關規定)。
mt: St. Petersburg cruises include in-city sightseeing. Passengers on board are not required to have a visa (check the relevant regulations).
ref: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: 賭場通常會做許多努力，盡量讓賓客待得更久、花得更多。那裡通常沒有窗戶和時鐘，也難以找到出口。
mt: Casinos usually do a lot of work, trying to keep guests staying longer and spend more. There are usually no windows and clocks, and it is also difficult to find exits.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.

src: 他們通常會提供特別的餐點、飲料和娛樂以保持客人心情愉悅，並讓後者留在現場。
mt: They usually provide special meals, drinks and entertainment to keep guests happy and keep the latter on site.
ref: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.

src: 有些場所會免費招待含酒精飲料。不過喝醉酒可是會削減判斷力，好的賭徒都很清楚保持清醒的重要性。
mt: Some places offer free alcoholic drinks. However, drunkenness can reduce judgment, and good gamblers are well aware of the importance of staying awake.
ref: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: 任何要在高海拔地區駕駛或者要在山上道路開車的人，都應該要考慮自己有多大的機率會遇到降雪、結冰或冰點以下的溫度。
mt: Anyone who wants to drive in high-altitude areas or drive on mountain roads should consider the probability of encountering snowfall, freezing or temperatures below freezing point.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.

src: 在結冰和積雪的路面上，摩擦力很低，您無法像在普通瀝青路面上那樣行駛。
mt: On icy and snowy surfaces, the friction is low and you can’t drive like on a regular asphalt surface.
ref: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.

src: 暴風雪期間，極短時間內便可降下足以讓您動彈不得的雪量。
mt: During a blizzard, you can get as much snow as you want in a short period of time.
ref: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.

src: 下雪或高吹雪、冷凝作用或車窗上的結冰都可能使可見度降低。
mt: Snow or high blowing, condensation effect, or ice on the car window may reduce visibility.
ref: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.

src: 另一方面，在很多國家，冰雪氣候都十分常見，而且交通幾乎全年無阻。
mt: On the other hand, snow and ice climates are very common in many countries, and transportation is almost uninterrupted throughout the year.
ref: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: 獵遊可說是非洲最吸引人的觀光元素，也是許多訪客旅程中的重點。
mt: Hunting can be said to be one of Africa's most attractive tourist elements, and it is also a key point in many visitor journeys.
ref: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.

src: 「Safari」一詞普遍是指欣賞壯麗的非洲野生動植物，特別是草原動植物的陸上旅行。
mt: The term 'Safari' generally refers to a land-based tour of Africa's magnificent wildlife, especially the prairie flora and fauna.
ref: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.

src: 大象和長頸鹿這些動物往往會接近車子，因此標準裝備能讓你看得更清楚。
mt: Elephants and giraffes often get close to cars, so standard equipment makes it easier to see.
ref: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.

src: 獅子、獵豹和花豹有時會害怕人靠近，比較適合用雙筒望遠鏡來觀察。
mt: Lions, leopards and leopards sometimes fear people approaching them, making them more suitable for observing with binoculars.
ref: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.

src: 野生徒步之旅（也稱做叢林漫步﹑野生健行或遠足）包含登山，行程長短可以是幾小時或幾天。
mt: Wild hiking (also known as jungle trekking, wild hiking or hiking) includes mountaineering, and the length of the trip can be several hours or days.
ref: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.

src: 帕運會將於 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日舉行。其中幾個項目將在日本其他地方進行。
mt: The Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. A few of these events will take place elsewhere in Japan.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.

src: 東京將成為唯一一座主辦過兩場夏季奧林匹克運動會的亞洲城市，上一次舉辦是在 1964 年。
mt: Tokyo will become the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, with the last one held in 1964.
ref: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.

src: 如果你是在宣布延期之前就預訂了 2020 年的機票和住宿，你面臨的情況可能有點棘手。
mt: If you booked your 2020 tickets and accommodation before the announcement of the postponement, you may face a bit of a tricky situation.
ref: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.

src: 取消政策各家不同，但三月底後大多數因新冠病毒所設的取消政策並沒有延長到 2020 年七月，亦即原定舉辦奧運的日期。
mt: Cancellation policies vary from country to country, but after the end of March most of the cancellation policies set up by the new coronavirus have not been extended to July 2020, which is also the originally scheduled date for the Olympics.
ref: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.

src: 預計大多數的活動票價會落在 2,500 到 130,000 日幣之間，而一般票價約為 7,000 日幣。
mt: It is estimated that most of the activity ticket prices fall between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, while the general ticket price is about 7,000 yen.
ref: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: 熨燙潮濕的衣服有助於乾燥衣服。許多飯店即使客房內未提供熨斗和燙衣板，也可以跟飯店借用。
mt: Ironing wet clothes helps to dry clothes. Many hotels can borrow irons from the hotel even if they do not have irons and ironing boards in their rooms.
ref: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.

src: 如果沒有熨斗，或你不喜歡穿熨過的襪子，那你可以試著使用吹風機吹乾襪子，如果有的話。
mt: If you don’t have an iron, or if you don’t like wearing ironed socks, you can try to dry your socks with a hairdryer, if any.
ref: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.

src: 注意不要讓織物的溫度太高（可能導致縮水，極端情況下也可能燒焦）。
mt: Note that the temperature of the fabric should not be too high (it may cause shrinkage, and in extreme cases may burn).
ref: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).

src: 在許多淨化水的方式中，有些可以更有效地處理特定威脅。
mt: In many ways of purifying water, some can more effectively handle specific threats.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.

src: 有些地區將水燒開一分鐘就夠了，在其他地區則需要數分鐘。
mt: In some areas, boiling water for a minute is enough, while in other areas it takes several minutes.
ref: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.

src: 濾網的效力各不相同，如果您有任何疑慮，不妨向商譽良好的公司購買密封的瓶裝水。
mt: The effectiveness of the filter varies. If you have any concerns, you may want to purchase sealed bottled water from a well-established company.
ref: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: 遊客可能會遇到在自己的家鄉不常見的動物害蟲。
mt: Tourists may encounter animal pests that are not common in their own hometowns.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.

src: 害蟲會破壞食物、引發不適，更糟糕的話可能造成過敏反應、散布毒液或傳播傳染病。
mt: Pests can damage food, cause discomfort, and even worse may cause allergic reactions, spread venom or spread infectious diseases.
ref: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.

src: 傳染病本身，或藉力傷害或殺害人的危險動物，通常不屬於害蟲。
mt: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that harm or kill people by force, are usually not pests.
ref: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: 免稅購物是在某些地區中買到免稅和免消費稅的商品的機會。
mt: Duty-free shopping is an opportunity to buy duty-free and consumption-free goods in some areas.
ref: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.

src: 前往重稅國家旅行的旅客，有時可以省下一筆不小的花費，尤其是在菸、酒等商品上。
mt: Travelers traveling to high-tax countries can sometimes save a significant amount of money, especially on tobacco, alcohol and other commodities.
ref: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.

src: 波恩馬里恩和費爾蒙特之間的路段，途中經過許多偏僻的荒涼地區，堪稱水牛城─匹茲堡高速公路上駕駛難度最高的路段。
mt: The section between Bonn-Marion and Fairmont passes through many remote, desolate areas, making it the most difficult road segment to drive on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.

src: 若您不習慣在鄉村道路上駕駛，請保持頭腦清醒：陡坡、窄道和急彎占了絕大多數。
mt: If you’re not used to driving on a country road, keep your mind awake: steep slopes, narrow lanes and sharp turns make up the vast majority.
ref: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.

src: 速限公告明顯低於前一段路和下一段路，一般為 35 至 40 英里 / 小時（56 至 64 公里 / 小時），嚴格遵守這些速限甚至比其他路段更重要。
mt: Speed limit announcements are significantly lower than the previous and next sections, generally 35 to 40 miles per hour (56 to 64 kilometers per hour), strictly following these speed limits is even more important than other sections.
ref: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.

src: 不過令人好奇的是，這裡的行動通訊服務比沿途其他路段還要強得多，例如賓州野地。
mt: However, what's curious is that the mobile communication service here is much stronger than other sections along the way, such as Pennsylvania Field.
ref: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: 德國糕點十分美味，而巴伐利亞邦的糕點則豐富且多樣，與他們的南方鄰居奧地利相似。
mt: German pastries are very delicious, while Bavarian pastries are rich and diverse, similar to their southern neighbor Austria.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.

src: 水果糕點很普遍，蘋果常年被製作成糕點，櫻桃與李子則在夏日會出現在餐桌上。
mt: Fruit pastries are very common, apples are often made into pastries, and cherries and plums appear on the table in summer.
ref: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.

src: 許多德國的烘焙食品中常含有杏仁、榛果和其他木本堅果。而熱門的蛋糕品項通常特別適合搭配一杯濃厚的咖啡。
mt: Many German baked goods often contain almonds, hazelnuts, and other wood nuts. Popular cake items are often particularly suitable for pairing with a thick cup of coffee.
ref: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.

src: 如果你想要一些小巧又有飽足感的點心，可以試試一種油炸果醬包，它依據地區有不同名稱：Berliner、Pfannkuchen 或 Krapfen。
mt: If you’re looking for a small, full-bodied snack, try a fried jam pack with different names depending on the region: Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: 咖哩是以藥草和香料為底，加上肉類或蔬菜的菜餚。
mt: Curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, with meat or vegetables added.
ref: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.

src: 咖哩依據液體含量多寡，而有「乾」或「濕」之分。
mt: Curry is divided into "dry" or "wet" according to the amount of liquid.
ref: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.

src: 巴基斯坦和北印度內陸區的咖哩料理中常用到優格；南印度和印度次大陸的其他沿海地區則常改用椰奶。
mt: In the interior of Pakistan and North India, yogurt is often used in curry dishes; in other coastal areas of South India and the Indian subcontinent, coconut milk is often used.
ref: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.

src: 由 1 萬 7000 多座島嶼的食物組成的印尼料理是一個總稱，涵蓋該國廣泛多樣的區域性菜色。
mt: Indonesian cuisine, consisting of food from over 17,000 islands, is a general term covering the country's wide and varied regional cuisine.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.

src: 但若用於沒有其他修飾語的情況，此用語通常是指源於爪哇本島中部和東部的食物。
mt: However, if used without other modifiers, this term usually refers to food originating from the central and eastern parts of Java Island.
ref: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.

src: 現在整個印尼都能吃到的爪哇菜，以各種經過簡單調味的菜餚為主，最常使用的調味品是花生、辣椒、糖（尤其是爪哇椰子糖）和各種香氣濃郁的香料。
mt: The Javanese cuisine that the whole of Indonesia can now eat is mainly a variety of dishes that have been simply seasoned, with the most commonly used condiments being peanuts, chili peppers, sugar (especially Java coconut sugar) and various fragrant spices.
ref: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: 馬鐙用以支撐騎士懸在馬鞍兩側的雙腳。
mt: The saddle is used to support the knights' legs suspended on both sides of the saddle.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.

src: 它們能為騎士帶來更多的穩定性，但騎士的腳有可能會被卡住，因此存在著安全上的疑慮。
mt: They can bring more stability to the knights, but their feet may be stuck, thus there are safety concerns.
ref: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.

src: 如果騎士從馬背上摔下來，但一隻腳卡在馬鐙中，他們可能會在馬匹跑開時被拖行。為了將此風險降到最低，可以採取許多安全預防措施。
mt: If a knight falls from the back of a horse, but one foot is stuck in the stable, they may be dragged while the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, many safety precautions can be taken.
ref: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.

src: 首先，大部份的騎士都穿著有鞋跟且鞋底平滑狹窄的馬靴。
mt: Firstly, most knights wear boots with heels and smooth and narrow soles.
ref: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.

src: 再來，有些馬鞍 (尤其英式馬鞍) 具備安全手把，騎乘者墜馬時往後拉，就可讓馬蹬上的皮帶從馬鞍上脫落。
mt: In addition, some saddles (especially British saddles) have safety handles, and when the rider falls off the horse, pulling back can make the belt on the saddle fall off.
ref: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: 科查莫谷──智利首屈一指的攀岩地點，有南美優勝美地之稱，擁有各式各樣的大片花崗岩壁和峭壁。
mt: Cochamo Valley – Chile’s premier climbing site, known for its South American beauty, is home to a wide variety of granite walls and escarpments.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.

src: 山頂上有令人屏息的美景。世界各地的攀岩者持續在潛力無窮的岩壁上開創新的路線。
mt: Breathtaking views of the mountain tops. Climbers around the world continue to create innovative routes on the walls of the most promising rocks.
ref: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: 山地滑雪運動，包括雙板滑雪和單板滑雪，是廣受歡迎的運動，運動方式是將雙板滑雪板或單板滑雪板固定在雙腳上，然後沿著白雪覆蓋的地形滑下來。
mt: Mountain skiing is a popular sport that includes both snowboarding and snowboarding, the way of which is to fix a snowboard or snowboard on both feet, then slide down along snow-covered terrain.
ref: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.

src: 滑雪是很多人熱愛的旅遊盛事，這些人有時也被稱為滑雪迷，他們規劃的整個假期都以滑雪為主，並停留在特定地點。
mt: Skiing is a popular tourist event, and these people are sometimes referred to as ski enthusiasts. They plan the entire holiday to be mainly ski-related and stay at specific locations.
ref: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.

src: 滑雪的概念存在已久，山洞壁畫早在西元前五千年即已描繪了滑雪的人。
mt: The concept of skiing has existed for a long time, and cave paintings have been depicting people skiing as early as 5,000 BC.
ref: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!

src: 山地滑雪運動可以追溯到至少 17 世紀，而1861 年，挪威人在澳洲開設了第一間休閒滑雪俱樂部。
mt: Mountain skiing can be traced back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861, Norwegians opened their first ski club in Australia.
ref: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.

src: 滑雪背包客：此活動也稱作為山岳滑雪﹑滑雪旅遊或滑雪登山。
mt: Ski backpacker: This activity is also known as mountain skiing, skiing tourism or skiing mountain climbing.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.

src: 此活動與阿爾卑斯式登山滑雪類似，但通常不涉及高山滑雪與登山，這兩種活動在陡峭地形中進行，需要更堅固的滑雪板和雪靴。
mt: This activity is similar to alpine skiing in the Alps, but usually does not involve alpine skiing and mountaineering; these two activities are carried out on steep terrain, requiring stronger skis and boots.
ref: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.

src: 把滑雪路線想像成類似的健行路線。
mt: Think of skiing routes as similar hiking routes.
ref: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.

src: 狀況好的時候，雪地負重滑行的距離將比徒步健走稍微長一些，但你鮮少在淨空雪道上達到無重裝越野滑雪的速度。
mt: When conditions are good, the distance of heavy-duty snowboarding will be slightly longer than hiking, but you rarely reach a weightless cross-country skiing speed on the clear karate.
ref: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: 歐洲大陸雖然相對較小，但卻存在許多獨立國家。一般情況下，在數個國家間旅行代表著必須申請數個簽證，經歷多次護照檢查。
mt: Although the European continent is relatively small, there are many independent countries. Generally, traveling between several countries means that you must apply for several visas and have undergone multiple passport checks.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.

src: 不過，就這方面來說，申根區的運作方式就像一個國家。
mt: However, in this regard, the operation of the Schengen Area is like a country.
ref: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.

src: 只要您待在此區域，一般而言，不必再次通過護照控制檢查站，即可出入邊境。
mt: As long as you stay in this area, generally speaking, you do not need to pass through the passport control checkpoint again to enter and exit the border.
ref: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.

src: 同樣的，如持有申根簽證，你就不需要分別申請每個申根會員國的簽證，從而節省了時間、金錢和文書作業。
mt: Similarly, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa for each Schengen member country separately, thus saving time, money and paperwork.
ref: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: 哪些人造物品屬於古董並沒有一個放諸四海皆準的定義。有些稅務機關將歷史超過 100 年的物品定義為古董。
mt: There is no universal definition of what man-made items are antiques. Some tax authorities define objects that are more than 100 years old as antiques.
ref: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.

src: 不同的地理區域有不同的定義，在北美等地方，年代限制可能比歐洲短。
mt: Different geographic regions have different definitions, and in North America and other places, age restrictions may be shorter than those in Europe.
ref: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.

src: 手工藝品雖然比其他同類型量產商品的存在時間還要短，卻有可能會被認定為古董。
mt: Although handmade products have shorter existence times than other mass-produced products of the same type, they may be considered antiques.
ref: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.

src: 對薩米人來說，飼養馴鹿是重要的生計，對其他專長的眾多薩米人來說，養鹿業的週邊文化同樣也很重要。
mt: For the Sami people, raising reindeer is an important means of livelihood, and for many other Sami people who specialize in other fields, the peripheral culture of the deer industry is also very important.
ref: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.

src: 不過，即便是在傳統上，也並非所有薩米人都從事大規模馴鹿畜牧，反而是以捕魚、狩獵及類似活動為生，並將馴鹿視為拉重、背物的役用動物。
mt: However, even in traditional times, not all Sami people have engaged in large-scale reindeer animal husbandry, but rather live by fishing, hunting and similar activities, and consider reindeer as a useful animal for lifting heavy loads and backing.
ref: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.

src: 現今許多薩米人投入現代產業。旅遊業是薩米地區重要的收入來源。
mt: Today many Sami people are investing in modern industries. Tourism is an important source of income for the Sami region.
ref: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.

src: 儘管「吉普賽」一詞被廣泛使用，特別是在非羅姆人之中，但由於對羅姆人的負面刻板印象和不正確的理解，因此這個詞經常被認為是討人厭的。
mt: Although the term "gypsies" has been widely used, especially among non-Romites, due to its negative stereotypes and incorrect understanding of them, this word is often considered annoying.
ref: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.

src: 如果您要訪問的國家受到旅行建議的限制，則您的旅遊健康保險或行程取消保險可能會受到影響。
mt: If the country you are visiting is restricted by travel advice, your travel health insurance or trip cancellation coverage may be affected.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.

src: 除了自己查詢，你可能也會想諮詢政府的意見，不過他們的建議是為其公民而設計的。
mt: Besides self-inquiry, you may also want to consult the government's opinions, but their suggestions are designed for their citizens.
ref: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.

src: 舉例來說，在中東的美國公民可能會面臨有別於歐洲人或阿拉伯人的處境。
mt: For example, U.S. citizens in the Middle East may face situations different from those of Europeans or Arabs.
ref: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.

src: 諮詢意見只是對某國政治情況的簡短摘要。
mt: Consultation opinions are only a brief summary of a country's political situation.
ref: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.

src: 與其他地方能取得的詳細資訊相比，他們所提供的觀點常較粗略、籠統且過於簡化。
mt: Compared to other places' detailed information, the views they provide are often rougher, more general and more simplified.
ref: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: 惡劣天氣是所有危險天氣現象的總稱，有可能會造成破壞、嚴重的社會混亂或人命損失。
mt: Bad weather is a general term for all hazardous weather phenomena, which may cause destruction, severe social disorder or loss of life.
ref: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.

src: 惡劣天氣可能發生在世界上任何地方，且有不同的類型，會取決於地理、地形和大氣條件。
mt: Bad weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types, depending on geography, terrain, and atmospheric conditions.
ref: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.

src: 強風、冰雹、暴雨或暴雪、和野火是劇烈天氣的表現形式與結果，雷暴雨、龍捲風、海龍捲和氣旋也是。
mt: Strong winds, hail, heavy rain or blizzards, and wildfires are manifestations and results of severe weather, including thunderstorms, tornadoes, sea tornadoes, and cyclones.
ref: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.

src: 地域性與季節性的極端氣候現象包含了雪暴、暴風雪、冰風暴和沙塵暴。
mt: Regional and seasonal extreme weather phenomena include snowstorms, blizzards, ice storms, and dust storms.
ref: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.

src: 強烈建議遊客注意惡劣天氣是否可能影響到旅行地區，因為惡劣天氣可能會影響旅遊計畫。
mt: It is highly recommended that tourists pay attention to whether bad weather may affect the travel area, because bad weather may affect the travel plan.
ref: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.

src: 若有人計畫要前往那些被視為戰爭區域的國家，就該接受專業訓練。
mt: If someone plans to go to a country considered a war zone, they should receive professional training.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.

src: 在網際網路上搜尋「敵意環境課程」大概就能找到本地公司的地址。
mt: Search the Internet for the "hostile environment course" and you will probably find the address of the local company.
ref: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.

src: 課程通常會以更加詳盡、經常輔以實務經驗的方式，來說明在此討論過的所有問題。
mt: The course usually explains all the problems discussed here in a more detailed and often supplemented with practical experience.
ref: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.

src: 課程通常為期 2 到 5 天，會涉及角色扮演、大量的急救訓練，以及有時會做武器訓練。
mt: The course usually lasts for 2 to 5 days, involving role-playing, extensive first aid training, and sometimes weapon training.
ref: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.

src: 有關荒野求生的書籍和雜誌很常見，但是涉及戰區的出版物卻很少。
mt: Books and magazines about wilderness survival are quite common, but few publications involving war zones.
ref: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: 打算到國外接受變性手術的旅人，務必要攜帶有效的回程文件。
mt: Travelers who plan to undergo sex reassignment surgery abroad must bring valid return documents.
ref: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.

src: 各國政府不一定願意簽發未標示性別 (X) 的護照，或者為渴望特定姓名和性別的人更新文件。
mt: Governments may not necessarily be willing to issue undeclared gender (X) passports, or update documents for people who desire specific names and genders.
ref: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.

src: 各國政府願意認可這些文件的程度存在非常大的差異。
mt: The degree to which governments are willing to approve these documents varies greatly.
ref: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.

src: 2001 年 9 月 11 日之後，安全檢查站的搜查工作變得更加強硬。
mt: Since September 11, 2001, security checkpoints have become harder to search.
ref: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.

src: 尚未接受手術的跨性別者不應期待能在隱私權和尊嚴無損的情況下通過掃描機。
mt: Transgender individuals who have not undergone surgery should not expect to be able to pass the scanner without compromising their privacy and dignity.
ref: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.

src: 離岸流是海浪打上海灘後斷開而折回的浪，通常會出現在礁石附近或類似的地方。
mt: Offshore currents are waves that break off and return to the beach after being hit by waves, usually appearing near reefs or similar places.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.

src: 根據水下拓樸，回流的海浪會集中於少數較深的區域，並可能在此產生流向深水區的快速水流。
mt: According to the underwater topology, the tidal waves that flow back will be concentrated in a few deeper areas and may produce rapid water flow into deep water areas here.
ref: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.

src: 大部分致死原因都是在嘗試逆著海流游回去時用盡體力，此舉成功率可能非常渺茫。
mt: Most of the causes of death are that they use up their physical strength when trying to swim back against the sea current, and the success rate may be extremely slim.
ref: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.

src: 一旦您脫離了洋流，游回岸並不比平時困難。
mt: Once you've left the current, it's not harder to swim back to shore than usual.
ref: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.

src: 試著遊向一個不會再被困住的地方，或者，根據個人的游泳技術以及是否已有人注意到，也可以等待救援。
mt: Try to swim towards a place that won't be trapped again, or, based on individual swimming techniques and whether someone has noticed, can also wait for rescue.
ref: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: 逆向文化衝擊的出現速度比文化衝擊快（較無蜜月期），持續時間較長，也比較嚴重。
mt: The emergence rate of reverse cultural shock is faster than that of cultural shock (less honeymoon period), with a longer duration and more severe.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.

src: 對於容易適應新文化的遊客來說，有時重新調整融入自身的本土文化反而特別難。
mt: For tourists who are easily adapted to new cultures, sometimes it is even more difficult to adjust and blend in with their own local culture.
ref: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.

src: 在國外居住一段時間回國後，你已經適應了新文化，並且遺忘國內文化讓你養成的某些習慣。
mt: After living abroad for a period of time and returning to the country, you have already adapted to the new culture, and forgotten some of the habits that local culture has made you develop.
ref: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.

src: 剛到國外時，別人知道初到陌生國家的旅客需要時間適應，大多會以耐心和諒解的態度對待你。
mt: When you first go abroad, people know that it takes time for a new traveler to get used to a foreign country, and most of them treat you patiently and with understanding.
ref: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.

src: 但對於歸鄉遊子，人們可能覺得沒必要再擔待和理解他們。
mt: But for those who return home, people may feel that there is no need to bear and understand them again.
ref: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: 金字塔的聲光秀對小孩來說是該地區最有趣的東西之一。
mt: The sound and light show of the pyramid is one of the most interesting things in the area for children.
ref: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.

src: 你可以在黑夜中看到金字塔，並能在表演開始前靜靜地觀賞。
mt: You can see the pyramids at night and quietly watch them before the performance starts.
ref: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.

src: 通常會一直聽到遊客和攤販的聲音。聲光交織的故事宛如一本故事書。
mt: It is common to hear the voices of visitors and vendors all the time. The stories that are intertwined with light and sound are like a storybook.
ref: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.

src: 表演以斯芬克斯為背景，並由它來講述一個漫長的故事。
mt: The performance is set against the backdrop of Sphinx, and it tells a long story.
ref: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.

src: 畫面呈現在金字塔上，燈光則點亮了其他金字塔。
mt: The image is presented on a pyramid, and the light lights up other pyramids.
ref: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.

src: 數個國家都宣稱 1819 年發現的南設得蘭群島為其領地，這座島上有最多基地，2020 年已有十六個使用中的基地。
mt: Several countries claim the South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, as its territory; it has the most bases on the island, with sixteen active bases by 2020.
ref: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.

src: 此群島位於半島以北 120 公里處。最大的島為喬治王島，該島是人類定居點拉斯·埃斯特雷亞斯鎮的所在地。
mt: The archipelago is located 120 kilometres north of the peninsula. The largest island is George Island, which is home to the town of Las Estreas, a human settlement.
ref: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.

src: 其他島嶼包括利文斯頓島及迪塞普遜島，後者為一座活火山的破火山口，被水淹沒後形成壯觀的自然海港。
mt: Other islands include Livingston Island and Desipson Island, the latter being a volcanic caldera of an active volcano that was flooded to form a spectacular natural harbour.
ref: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.

src: 埃爾斯沃思地位於半島南方，以別林斯高晉海為界。
mt: Elsworth is located on the southern part of the peninsula, bounded by the Gulf of Belens.
ref: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.

src: 半島上的山脈在此匯集成高地，然後重新出現形成綿延 360 公里的埃爾斯沃思山脈，而明尼蘇達冰川將其一分為二。
mt: The mountain ranges on the peninsula gather here to form a highland, then reappear to form the Elsworth Mountains stretching 360 kilometers long, which the Minnesota Glacier divides into two.
ref: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.

src: 南極洲最高的山脈文森山海拔 4892 公尺，位於南極洲北部，或稱森提內嶺。
mt: The highest mountain range in Antarctica, Vincent Mountain, has an elevation of 4892 meters, located in the northern part of Antarctica, also known as the Sentier Range.
ref: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.

src: 在手機訊號到不了的偏遠地區，您可能只能選用衛星電話。
mt: In remote areas where cell phone signals cannot be reached, you may only choose to use satellite phones.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.

src: 一般而言，衛星電話無法替代行動電話，因為您必須在戶外且對準衛星才能撥打電話。
mt: In general, satellite phones cannot replace mobile phones because you must be outdoors and aligned with the satellite to make a call.
ref: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.

src: 船舶（包括遊樂船和有遠端資料與音訊需求的探險船）時常使用這項服務。
mt: Vessels (including cruise ships and expedition ships with remote data and audio requirements) often use this service.
ref: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.

src: 你所屬當地電信服務業者，應可提供更多連線到此服務的資訊。
mt: Your local telecommunications service provider should be able to provide more information about connecting to this service.
ref: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: 對於那些規劃空檔年的人，越來越熱門的選擇是去旅行和學習。
mt: For those planning a gap year, the increasingly popular choice is to travel and learn.
ref: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.

src: 這對應屆畢業生來說特別受歡迎，讓他們在大學畢業前能有一年的假期，而不用犠牲學業。
mt: This year's graduates are particularly popular, allowing them to have a year of vacation before graduation without sacrificing their studies.
ref: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.

src: 許多時候，參加國外的空檔年課程，這其實能提升你回國後接受高等教育的機會。
mt: Many times, taking a year's program abroad can actually increase your chances of going to higher education after you return to Taiwan.
ref: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.

src: 一般來說，參加這些教學計畫必須支付學費。
mt: Generally speaking, attending these educational programs must pay tuition fees.
ref: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.

src: 芬蘭是非常適合划船的地方。有「千湖之國」之稱的芬蘭也坐擁數以千計個湖中島或沿海群島。
mt: Finland is a great place to row a boat. Known as the “Land of Thousand Lakes,” Finland also has thousands of island lakes or coastal islands.
ref: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.

src: 在群島和湖泊中，您並不一定需要一隻遊艇。
mt: In islands and lakes, you don’t necessarily need a yacht.
ref: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.

src: 雖然沿海的群島和最大的湖泊對任何遊艇來說確實都夠大，但小船，甚至皮艇也能提供不同的體驗。
mt: Although coastal islands and the largest lakes are indeed large enough for any yacht, small boats, even kayaks, can provide different experiences.
ref: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.

src: 划船是芬蘭的國民消遣，每七或八個人就有一艘船。
mt: Rowing is a national pastime of Finland, with one boat for every seven or eight people.
ref: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.

src: 與其相符的有挪威、瑞典和紐西蘭，但在其他地區卻顯得相當特別（例如：在荷蘭此數字是 1 比 40）。
mt: Similar to Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, it is quite special in other regions (for example, in the Netherlands this number is 1:40).
ref: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).

src: 多數波羅的海專屬郵輪行程，都會在俄國聖彼得堡多停留一下。
mt: Most of the Baltic Sea cruises will stop in St. Petersburg, Russia for a while.
ref: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.

src: 換言之你可以花好幾個整天走訪這座歷史古城，晚上返回船上過夜。
mt: In other words, you can spend several days visiting this historical ancient city, and return to the ship at night to spend the night.
ref: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.

src: 如果你是參加隨船的旅遊行程上岸，並不需要有額外的簽證（截至 2009 年為止）。
mt: There is no need for an additional visa (as of 2009) if you are ashore on a boat trip.
ref: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).

src: 有些郵輪行程手冊中介紹了德國柏林。如上方地圖所示，柏林並不靠海，因此造訪此城的花費並不包含在郵輪費用中。
mt: Some cruise itineraries introduce Berlin, Germany. As shown on the map above, Berlin does not rely on the sea, so the cost of visiting this city is not included in the cruise cost.
ref: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.

src: 無論年紀或背景，坐飛機旅行都可能是個可怕的體驗，尤其是沒坐過飛機或曾有創傷經歷的人。
mt: Regardless of age or background, traveling by air can be a terrifying experience, especially for those who have never flown or had traumatic experiences.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.

src: 這並不是什麼丟臉的事：這和許多人害怕或厭惡某些特定的東西沒什麼不同。
mt: It's not a shameful thing: it's no different from many people who are afraid or hate certain things.
ref: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.

src: 對某些人而言，認識飛機的運作原理以及飛行中發生的事，這可能有助於他們克服基於未知或不可控因素的恐懼。
mt: For some people, understanding the operating principle of an airplane and what happens during flight may help them overcome fear based on unknown or uncontrollable factors.
ref: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: 快遞公司快速將貨品送達，以此收取優渥酬勞。通常在運送商業文件、商品或緊急維修用的零件時，時間非常重要。
mt: Courier companies deliver goods quickly to collect good money. Usually, time is important when shipping business documents, goods or spare parts for emergency repairs.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.

src: 規模較大的公司在部分航線上有自己的飛機，但是其他航線或規模較小的公司，就會比較麻煩。
mt: Larger companies have their own aircraft on some routes, but other routes or smaller companies will be more troublesome.
ref: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.

src: 如果他們使用空運寄送東西，則在某些路線上可能要耗費幾天才能完成卸貨與通關。
mt: If they use air transport to send things, it may take several days on some routes to complete the unloading and clearance.
ref: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

src: 更快速送達的唯一方法，就是將貨物當成拖運行李寄送。航空公司規定禁止拖運非乘客的行李，此時你的機會就來了。
mt: The only way to get there faster is to use it as a towing bag. Airline regulations prohibit the carriage of non-passenger baggage, and your opportunity is here.
ref: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: 要搭上頭等艙或商務艙，最直接了當的方式，就是拿出厚厚一疊鈔票享受優待（還有更好的方式，那就是讓公司出錢）。
mt: The most direct way to get into first class or business class is to take out a thick pile of cash and enjoy the preferential treatment (there's also a better way, that's to let the company pay).
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).

src: 不過，這並不便宜：粗略計算一下，您大概需要花費經機艙四倍的價格購買商務艙，以及十一倍的價格購買頭等艙！
mt: However, this is not cheap: roughly, you will probably need to spend four times the price of the cabin to buy business class, and eleven times the price to buy first class!
ref: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!

src: 一般來說從甲地到乙地的直飛航班，試圖尋找商務艙或頭等艙座位優惠只是徒勞無益。
mt: Generally speaking, direct flights from A to B are only futile in trying to find business class or first-class seat discounts.
ref: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.

src: 航空公司深諳市場上存在了一些願意支付高昂費用，以換取能快速，舒適地到達目的地的核心客群。
mt: The airline understands that there are some core customers in the market who are willing to pay high fees in exchange for being able to reach their destination quickly and comfortably.
ref: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: 摩爾多瓦共和國的首都是基希涅夫。當地的官方語言是羅馬尼亞語，但也廣泛使用俄語。
mt: The capital of the Republic of Moldova is Chi ⁇ inău. The official language of the region is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.

src: 摩爾多瓦是一個多種族的共和國，飽受種族衝突問題之苦。
mt: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic, suffering from racial conflicts.
ref: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.

src: 1994 年，這場衝突導致摩爾多瓦東部出現了一個自稱為聶斯特河沿岸共和國的國家。該國擁有自己的政府和貨幣，但並未獲得任何聯合國成員國的承認。
mt: In 1994, the conflict led to the emergence of a country in eastern Moldova that claimed to be the Transnistrian Republic. The country has its own government and currency, but it has not been recognized by any UN member state.
ref: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.

src: 儘管政治協商失敗，摩爾多瓦的這兩個部份之間，已重新建立起經濟連結。
mt: Despite the failure of political negotiations, economic ties have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova.
ref: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.

src: 摩爾多瓦的主要宗教是東正教。
mt: The main religion of Moldova is Eastern Orthodoxy.
ref: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: 伊茲密爾 (Izmir) 是土耳其的第三大城市，人口約 370 萬，是僅次於伊斯坦堡的第二大港口，也是絕佳的交通樞紐。
mt: Izmir is Turkey's third-largest city, with a population of approximately 3.7 million, making it the second-largest port after Istanbul and an excellent transportation hub.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.

src: 過去的古城士麥那，如今是一個已開發的繁忙現代商業中心，地處巨大海灣旁，周圍群山環繞。
mt: The ancient city of Smyrna in the past is now a busy and modern commercial center that has been developed, located on the edge of a huge bay, surrounded by mountains.
ref: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.

src: 傳統的紅瓦屋頂、18 世紀的市場，以及古老的清真寺和教堂，錯落在寬闊的林蔭大道、玻璃帷幕大樓，與現代的購物中心之間，儘管這座城市相較於傳統土耳其，地中海歐洲的氛圍更加濃厚。
mt: Traditional red-tiled roofs, 18th-century markets, ancient mosques and churches all fall between broad boulevards, glass-walled buildings and modern shopping centers, despite the city's atmosphere being even more intense than that of traditional Turkey in the Mediterranean Europe.
ref: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: 在哈爾多斯維克村能看到鄰近的東島景色，且有一座而特別的八角形教堂。
mt: In the village of Haldoswick, you can see the scenery of the nearby East Island and there is a special octagonal church.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.

src: 在教堂的院落中，一些墓碑上有一些有趣的鴿子大理石雕像。
mt: In the courtyard of the church, some tombstones have some interesting pigeon marble statues.
ref: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.

src: 值得在這座迷人村莊漫步半小時。
mt: It's worth a half-hour walk in this charming village.
ref: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: 往北不遠處是浪漫且迷人的城鎮──辛特拉，這裡對外國人來說非常有名，因為拜倫男爵曾對它的美景進行過鮮明的描繪。
mt: Not far north is the romantic and charming town of Sintra, which is very famous for foreigners, because Baron Byron has vividly depicted its beauty.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.

src: Scotturb 公車 403 會固定開往辛特拉，停靠在羅卡角。
mt: Scotturb bus 403 is bound to Sintra and stops at Roca Point.
ref: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.

src: 也可以前往北方造訪非凡的花地瑪聖母朝聖地，那是世界聞名的聖母顯靈處。
mt: It can also be visited to the north to visit the extraordinary Fatima Virgin pilgrimage site, which is the world-renowned site of the Virgin Mary.
ref: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 請記住，實際上你正在參觀一座萬人塚遺址，而且此遺址對世上相當數量的人來說，有著重大意義。
mt: Remember, you're actually visiting a mass grave site, and it's of great significance to a considerable number of people in the world.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.

src: 仍有許多當時在此的男女存活了下來，還有更多人的摯愛在此被殺害或勞動至死，不管是不是猶太。
mt: Many men and women who were still living here survived, with many more people's love being killed or labored to death here, whether it was not Jewish.
ref: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.

src: 請滿懷應有的端莊、莊重和尊重對待此遺址。切勿拿大屠殺或納粹開玩笑。
mt: Please treat this site with dignity, dignity and respect. Do not joke about the Holocaust or the Nazis.
ref: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.

src: 請勿在建築物上做標記或塗鴉，以免破壞景點的外觀。
mt: Do not mark or graffiti on the building to avoid damaging the appearance of the attraction.
ref: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: 巴塞隆納的官方語言是加泰隆尼亞語和西班牙語。約有一半的人口比較喜歡講加泰隆尼亞語，絕大多數的人都聽得懂，而幾乎所有人都懂西班牙語。
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, and the vast majority of people understand it, and almost all of them speak Spanish.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.

src: 不過，大部分的標誌都只用加泰隆語顯示，因為它是法律規定的第一官方語言。
mt: However, most signs are only displayed in Catalan because it is the first official language of law.
ref: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.

src: 不過，西班牙語也被廣泛地使用在大眾運輸與其他場所。
mt: However, Spanish is also widely used in public transportation and other places.
ref: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.

src: 地鐵中的固定廣播只有加泰羅尼亞語，但自動化系統也會以西班牙語、英語、法語、阿拉伯語、日語等多國語言進行意料之外的插播。
mt: The fixed broadcast in the subway is only Catalan, but the automation system also uses Spanish, English, French, Arabic, Japanese and other languages for unexpected interpolation.
ref: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: 巴黎人有著自我中心、無禮與自大的惡名。
mt: The Parisians have a self-centered, impolite and arrogant bad name.
ref: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.

src: 雖然在巴黎生活就要表現出最好的一面，這種說法往往只是不正確的刻板印象，不過言行舉止表現出 「bien élevé」（有教養）的樣子，還是比較容易讓你左右逢源。
mt: Although living in Paris has to show the best side, this kind of statement is often just an incorrect stereotype, but the way you behave and act like a "bien élevé" (breded) is still more likely to make you meet the source.
ref: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.

src: 如果您展現了基本的禮節，巴黎人表面上的粗率無禮就會迅速消失。
mt: If you show a basic courtesy, the Parisian’s impoliteness on the surface will quickly disappear.
ref: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.

src: 十六湖國家公園林木蔥鬱，以山毛櫸、雲杉和樅樹為主，融合了高山和地中海植物景觀。
mt: The 16 Lake National Park is lush and lush, mainly composed of beech, spruce and spruce trees, blending alpine and Mediterranean plant landscapes.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.

src: 由於它的微氣候範圍、相異的土壤及不同海拔高度，使它擁有相當廣泛多樣的植物群落。
mt: Due to its micro ⁇  range, different soils and different elevations, it has a relatively wide variety of plant communities.
ref: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.

src: 此地區也擁有種類極為豐富的動物和鳥類。
mt: This area also has a very rich variety of animals and birds.
ref: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.

src: 那裡有歐洲棕熊、狼、老鷹、貓頭鷹、猞猁、野貓和松雞等稀有動物群，此外也有許多較常見的物種
mt: There are rare animal groups such as European brown bears, wolves, eagles, owls, slugs, wild cats and grouse, as well as many more common species.
ref: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: 在造訪修道院時，女子必須穿上過膝的裙子，也不能露肩。
mt: During her visit to the monastery, a woman must wear a knee-high skirt and cannot expose her shoulders.
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.

src: 大部分的修道院備有裹巾給沒有準備而來的女性，但如果你自己有準備（特別是鮮豔色彩的款式），入口處的修士或修女就會對你投以微笑。
mt: Most monasteries have a scarf for women who are not prepared, but if you prepare yourself (especially in bright colors), the monks or nuns at the entrance will smile at you.
ref: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.

src: 同樣地，男人必須穿著遮蓋膝蓋的長褲。
mt: Similarly, men must wear pants covering their knees.
ref: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.

src: 您也可以在入口處商借庫存，但這些衣物並未在每位使用者穿著後皆清洗，所以您在穿著這些裙子時可能會稍感不適。男士衣物皆為單一尺碼！
mt: You can also borrow from the store at the entrance, but these items are not cleaned after everyone is wearing them, so you may feel a little uncomfortable wearing these dresses. Men's clothing is a single size!
ref: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: 馬略卡島飲食ㄆ就跟地中海的其他類似地區一樣，以麵包、蔬菜和肉類（特別是豬肉）為主，而且普遍使用橄欖油。
mt: Like other similar regions in the Mediterranean, the island's diet consists mainly of bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork) and olive oil is widely used.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.

src: 一種簡單的人氣晚餐是 Pa amb Oli，夏季期間尤其流行：麵包配橄欖油、番茄和任何可取得的調味料，例如起司、鮪魚等。
mt: A simple and popular dinner is Pa amb Oli, especially popular during the summer: bread with olive oil, tomatoes and any available seasonings such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: 所有名詞以及 Sie （意思為'您'）一詞，即使在句子中間出現，仍然會以大寫字母開頭。
mt: All nouns and the word "Sie" (meaning 'you') begin with a capital letter even when they appear in the middle of a sentence.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.

src: 這是分別一些動詞和受詞的重要方式。
mt: This is an important way to distinguish some verbs and objects.
ref: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.

src: 這或許也使閱讀變得更加容易，但由於需要確認名詞化的形式中應使用動詞或形容詞，寫作變得有點複雜。
mt: This may also make reading easier, but because it is necessary to confirm that the form of nounization should use verbs or adjectives, writing becomes a bit complicated.
ref: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: 義大利文的發音相對簡單，畢竟多數單字的拼法與讀音一模一樣。
mt: The pronunciation of Italian is relatively simple, after all, most words have the same spelling and pronunciation.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written

src: 主要需要留意的字母是 c 和 g，因為它們的發音會根據其後的母音而產生變化。
mt: The main letters that need attention are c and g, because their pronunciation will change according to the subsequent vowels.
ref: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.

src: 還有，務必以不同的方式發音 r 和 rr：care 的意思是親愛的，而 carro 的意思是古代戰車。
mt: In addition, it is necessary to pronounce r and rr in different ways: care means darling, while carro means ancient chariot.
ref: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: 波斯語文法相對簡單且大多有固定規則。
mt: The Persian grammar is relatively simple and mostly has fixed rules.
ref: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.

src: 因此，閱讀此文法入門有助於學習更多波斯語法，並能增進對片語的理解。
mt: Therefore, reading this grammar introduction helps to learn more Persian grammar and enhance understanding of phrases.
ref: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.

src: 不用說，如果你會一種羅曼語系的語言，那葡萄牙文對你來說會非常好學。
mt: Needless to say, if you can speak a Romance language, Portuguese will be very good to you.
ref: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.

src: 不過，對西班牙語略有了解的人可能會草草作出葡萄牙語與其十分相似而不需特別學習的結論。
mt: However, those who have a slight understanding of Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is very similar to it and do not require special learning.
ref: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.

src: 前現代的天文台在今日通常已過時，並繼續當成博物館或教育場所來用。
mt: Premodern observatories are usually outdated and continue to be used as museums or educational venues today.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.

src: 由於光害在前現代天文台的全盛時期沒有如今嚴重，它們通常坐落在城市或校園中，比現代建造的那些天文台更容易到達。
mt: Due to light pollution being less severe at the peak of the pre-modern observatory, they were usually located in cities or schools, making them easier to reach than those modern-built observatories.
ref: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.

src: 大部分現代研究型望遠鏡都是巨大的設施，座落於有大氣條件良好的偏遠地區。
mt: Most modern research telescopes are large facilities located in remote areas with good atmospheric conditions.
ref: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: 賞櫻，又稱為「花見」，從西元 8 世紀起就是日本文化的一環。
mt: The sight of the cherry blossoms, also known as "flower views," has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.

src: 這種觀念來自中國，而中國人賞的是梅花。
mt: This concept comes from China, and the Chinese admire the plum flower.
ref: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.

src: 在日本，最早的櫻花祭是天皇專為自己和皇宮周邊其他貴族所辦的。
mt: In Japan, the earliest cherry blossom festival was held by the Emperor for himself and other nobles around the Imperial Palace.
ref: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: 植物在自然環境中最美麗了，所以請忍住「只摘一朵就好」的誘惑。
mt: Plants are the most beautiful in the natural environment, so please endure the temptation of "just pick one".
ref: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.

src: 當你造訪一座精心布置的花園，採集「樣本」也會導致你遭到驅離，沒有任何討論空間。
mt: When you visit a well-furnished garden, collecting "samples" can also lead to your being expelled, leaving no room for discussion.
ref: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.

src: 新加坡大體上是極安全的去處，交通非常便利，入境後你幾乎什麼都能買到。
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place to visit, with very convenient transportation, and you can buy almost anything after entering.
